   28: 	 init_per_group/2,end_per_group/2]).

   31:          connect_node/1,

   42: 	 monitor_nodes_complex_nodedown_reason/1,

   44: 	 monitor_nodes_misc/1,
   45: 	 monitor_nodes_otp_6481/1,
   46: 	 monitor_nodes_errors/1,

   48: 	 monitor_nodes_cleanup/1,
   49: 	 monitor_nodes_many/1,
   50:          monitor_nodes_down_up/1,
   51:          dist_ctrl_proc_smoke/1,
   52:          dist_ctrl_proc_reject/1,
   53:          erl_uds_dist_smoke_test/1,
   54:          erl_1424/1, net_kernel_start/1, differing_cookies/1,
   55:          cmdline_setcookie_2/1, connection_cookie/1,
   56:          dyn_differing_cookies/1,
   57:          xdg_cookie/1,
   58:          allowed/1]).
   59: 
   60: %% Performs the test at another node.
   61: -export([get_socket_priorities/0,
   62:          get_net_ticker_fullsweep_option/1,
   63: 	 tick_cli_test/3, tick_cli_test1/3,
   64: 	 tick_serv_test/2, tick_serv_test1/1,
   65: 	 run_remote_test/1,
   66:          dyn_node_name_do/2,
   67:          epmd_reconnect_do/2,
   68: 	 setopts_do/2,
   69:          setopts_deadlock_test/2,
   70: 	 keep_conn/1, time_ping/1,
   71:          ddc_remote_run/2]).
   72: 
   73: -export([net_kernel_start_do_test/1]).
   74: 
   75: -export([init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2]).
   76: 
   77: -export([dist_cntrlr_output_test_size/2]).

   79: -export([pinger/1]).

   81: -export([start_uds_rpc_server/1]).
   82: 
   83: -define(DUMMY_NODE,dummy@test01).
   84: -define(ALT_EPMD_PORT, "12321").
   85: -define(ALT_EPMD_CMD, "epmd -port "++?ALT_EPMD_PORT).
   86: 
   87: %%-----------------------------------------------------------------
   88: %% The distribution is mainly tested in the big old test_suite.
   89: %% This test only tests the net_ticktime configuration flag.
   90: %% Should be started in a CC view with:
   91: %% erl -sname master -rsh ctrsh
   92: %%-----------------------------------------------------------------
   93: 
   94: suite() ->
   95:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   96:      {timetrap,{minutes,12}}].
   97: 
   98: all() -> 
   99:     [dist_ctrl_proc_smoke,
  100:      dist_ctrl_proc_reject,
  101:      tick, tick_intensity, tick_change, nodenames, hostnames,
  102:      illegal_nodenames, connect_node,
  103:      dyn_node_name,
  104:      epmd_reconnect,
  105:      hidden_node, setopts,
  106:      table_waste, net_setuptime, inet_dist_options_options,
  107:      net_ticker_spawn_options,
  108:      {group, monitor_nodes},
  109:      erl_uds_dist_smoke_test,
  110:      erl_1424, net_kernel_start,
  111:      {group, differing_cookies},
  112:      allowed
  113:      ].
  114: 
  115: groups() -> 
  116:     [{monitor_nodes, [],
  117:       [monitor_nodes_nodedown_reason,
  118:        monitor_nodes_complex_nodedown_reason,
  119:        monitor_nodes_node_type, monitor_nodes_misc,
  120:        monitor_nodes_otp_6481, monitor_nodes_errors,
  121:        monitor_nodes_combinations, monitor_nodes_cleanup,
  122:        monitor_nodes_many,
  123:        monitor_nodes_down_up]},
  124:      {differing_cookies, [],
  125:       [differing_cookies,
  126:        cmdline_setcookie_2,
  127:        connection_cookie,
  128:        dyn_differing_cookies,
  129:        xdg_cookie]}].
  130: 
  131: init_per_suite(Config) ->
  132:     start_gen_tcp_dist_test_type_server(),
  133:     Config.
  134: 
  135: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
  136:     [slave:stop(N) || N <- nodes()],
  137:     kill_gen_tcp_dist_test_type_server(),
  138:     ok.
  139: 
  140: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  141:     Config.
  142: 
  143: end_per_group(monitor_nodes, Config) ->
  144:     %% we disconnect existing nodes because they interfere
  145:     %% with other tests where `nodes() == []` but it wasn't.
  146:     ok = kill_existing_nodes(),
  147:     Config;
  148: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  149:     Config.
  150: 
  151: init_per_testcase(TC, Config) when TC == hostnames;
  152:                                    TC == nodenames ->
  153:     file:make_dir("hostnames_nodedir"),
  154:     file:write_file("hostnames_nodedir/ignore_core_files",""),
  155:     Config;
  156: init_per_testcase(epmd_reconnect, Config) ->
  157:     [] = os:cmd(?ALT_EPMD_CMD++" -relaxed_command_check -daemon"),
  158:     Config;
  159: init_per_testcase(Func, Config) when is_atom(Func), is_list(Config) ->
  160:     Config.
  161: 
  162: end_per_testcase(epmd_reconnect, _Config) ->
  163:     os:cmd(?ALT_EPMD_CMD++" -kill"),
  164:     ok;
  165: end_per_testcase(_Func, _Config) ->
  166:     ok.
  167: 
  168: connect_node(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  169:     Connected = nodes(connected),
  170:     true = net_kernel:connect_node(node()),
  171:     Connected = nodes(connected),
  172:     ok.
  173: 
  174: tick(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  175:     run_dist_configs(fun tick/2, Config).
  176: 
  177: tick(DCfg, Config) ->
  178:     tick_test(DCfg, Config, false).
  179: 
  180: tick_intensity(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  181:     run_dist_configs(fun tick_intensity/2, Config).
  182: 
  183: tick_intensity(DCfg, Config) ->
  184:     tick_test(DCfg, Config, true).
  185: 
  186: tick_test(DCfg, _Config, CheckIntensityArg) ->
  187:     %%
  188:     %% This test case use disabled "connect all" so that
  189:     %% global wont interfere...
  190:     %%
  191: 
  192:     [Name1, Name2] = get_nodenames(2, dist_test),
  193: 
  194:     {ok, Node} = start_node(DCfg, Name1),
  195: 
  196:     case CheckIntensityArg of
  197:         true ->
  198:             %% Not for intensity test...
  199:             ok;
  200:         false ->
  201:             %% First check that the normal case is OK!
  202:             rpc:call(Node, erl_distribution_SUITE, tick_cli_test, [node(), 8000, 16000]),
  203: 
  204:             erlang:monitor_node(Node, true),
  205:             receive
  206:                 {nodedown, Node} ->
  207:                     ct:fail("nodedown from other node")
  208:             after 30000 ->
  209:                     erlang:monitor_node(Node, false)
  210:             end,
  211:             ok
  212:     end,
  213: 
  214:     stop_node(Node),
  215: 
  216:     %% Now, set the net_ticktime for the other node to 12 secs.
  217:     %% After the sleep(2sec) and cast the other node shall destroy
  218:     %% the connection as it has not received anything on the connection.
  219:     %% The nodedown message should arrive within 8 < T < 16 secs.
  220: 
  221:     %% We must have two slave nodes as the slave mechanism otherwise
  222:     %% halts the client node after tick timeout (the connection is down
  223:     %% and the slave node decides to halt !!
  224: 
  225:     %% Set the ticktime on the server node to 100 secs so the server
  226:     %% node doesn't tick the client node within the interval ...
  227: 
  228:     {ok, ServNode} = start_node(DCfg, Name2,
  229: 				"-kernel net_ticktime 100 -connect_all false"),
  230:     rpc:call(ServNode, erl_distribution_SUITE, tick_serv_test, [Node, node()]),
  231: 
  232:     %% We set min/max a second lower/higher than expected since it takes
  233:     %% time for termination of the dist controller, delivery of messages,
  234:     %% scheduling of the process receiving nodedown, etc...
  235:     {IArg, Min, Max} = case CheckIntensityArg of
  236:                            false ->
  237:                                {"", 7000, 17000};
  238:                            true ->
  239:                                {" -kernel net_tickintensity 24", 10500, 13500}
  240:                        end,
  241:     
  242:     {ok, Node} = start_node(DCfg, Name1,
  243:                             "-kernel net_ticktime 12 -connect_all false" ++ IArg),
  244: 
  245:     rpc:call(Node, erl_distribution_SUITE, tick_cli_test, [ServNode, Min, Max]),
  246: 
  247:     spawn_link(erl_distribution_SUITE, keep_conn, [Node]),
  248: 
  249:     {tick_serv, ServNode} ! {i_want_the_result, self()},
  250: 
  251:     monitor_node(ServNode, true),
  252:     monitor_node(Node, true),
  253: 
  254:     receive
  255: 	{tick_test, T} when is_integer(T) ->
  256: 	    stop_node(ServNode),
  257: 	    stop_node(Node),
  258:             io:format("Result: ~p~n", [T]),
  259: 	    T;
  260: 	{tick_test, Error} ->
  261: 	    stop_node(ServNode),
  262: 	    stop_node(Node),
  263: 	    ct:fail(Error);
  264: 	{nodedown, Node} ->
  265: 	    stop_node(ServNode),
  266: 	    ct:fail("client node died");
  267: 	{nodedown, ServNode} ->
  268: 	    stop_node(Node),
  269: 	    ct:fail("server node died")
  270:     end,
  271:     ok.
  272: 
  273: %% Checks that pinging nonexistyent nodes does not waste space in distribution table.
  274: table_waste(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  275:     run_dist_configs(fun table_waste/2, Config).
  276: 
  277: table_waste(DCfg, _Config) ->
  278:     {ok, HName} = inet:gethostname(),
  279:     F = fun(0,_F) -> [];
  280: 	   (N,F) -> 
  281: 		Name = list_to_atom("erl_distribution_"++integer_to_list(N)++
  282: 					"@"++HName),
  283: 		pang = net_adm:ping(Name),
  284: 		F(N-1,F)
  285: 	end,
  286:     F(256,F),
  287:     {ok, N} = start_node(DCfg, erl_distribution_300),
  288:     stop_node(N),
  289:     ok.
  290: 
  291: %% Test that starting nodes with different legal name part works, and that illegal
  292: %% ones are filtered
  293: nodenames(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  294:     legal("a1@b"),
  295:     legal("a-1@b"),
  296:     legal("a_1@b"),
  297: 
  298:     %% Test that giving two -sname works as it should
  299:     started = test_node("a_1@b", false, long_or_short() ++ "a_0@b"),
  300: 
  301:     illegal("cdé@a"),
  302:     illegal("te欢st@a").
  303: 
  304: %% Test that starting nodes with different legal host part works, and that illegal
  305: %% ones are filtered
  306: hostnames(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  307:     Host = gethostname(),
  308:     legal([$a,$@|atom_to_list(Host)]),
  309:     legal("1@b1"),
  310:     legal("b@b1-c"),
  311:     legal("c@b1_c"),
  312:     legal("d@b1#c"),
  313:     legal("f@::1"),
  314:     legal("g@1:bc3:4e3f:f20:0:1"),
  315: 
  316:     case file:native_name_encoding() of
  317:         latin1 -> ignore;
  318:         _ -> legal("e@b1é")
  319:     end,
  320:     long_hostnames(net_kernel:longnames()),
  321: 
  322:     illegal("h@testالع"),
  323:     illegal("i@языtest"),
  324:     illegal("j@te欢st").
  325: 
  326: long_hostnames(true) ->
  327:     legal("k@b.b.c"),
  328:     legal("l@b.b-c.d"),
  329:     legal("m@b.b_c.d"),
  330:     legal("n@127.0.0.1"),
  331:     legal("o@207.123.456.789");
  332: long_hostnames(false) ->
  333:     illegal("k@b.b.c").
  334: 
  335: legal(Name) ->
  336:     case test_node(Name) of
  337:         started ->
  338:             ok;
  339:         not_started ->
  340:             ct:fail("no ~p node started", [Name])
  341:     end.
  342: 
  343: illegal(Name) ->
  344:     case test_node(Name, true) of
  345:         not_started ->
  346:             ok;
  347:         started ->
  348:             ct:fail("~p node started with illegal name", [Name])
  349:     end.
  350: 
  351: test_node(Name) ->
  352:     test_node(Name, false).
  353: test_node(Name, Illegal) ->
  354:     test_node(Name, Illegal, "").
  355: test_node(Name, Illegal, ExtraArgs) ->
  356:     ProgName = ct:get_progname(),
  357:     Command = ProgName ++ " -noinput " ++
  358:         long_or_short() ++ Name ++ ExtraArgs ++
  359:         " -eval \"net_adm:ping('" ++ atom_to_list(node()) ++ "')\"" ++
  360:         case Illegal of
  361:             true ->
  362:                 " -eval \"timer:sleep(10000),init:stop().\"";
  363:             false ->
  364:                 ""
  365:         end,
  366:     net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true),
  367:     BinCommand = unicode:characters_to_binary(Command, utf8),
  368:     _Prt = open_port({spawn, BinCommand}, [stream,{cd,"hostnames_nodedir"}]),
  369:     Node = list_to_atom(Name),
  370:     receive
  371:         {nodeup, Node} ->
  372:             net_kernel:monitor_nodes(false),
  373:             slave:stop(Node),
  374:             started
  375:     after 5000 ->
  376:         net_kernel:monitor_nodes(false),
  377:         not_started
  378:     end.
  379: 
  380: long_or_short() ->
  381:     case net_kernel:longnames() of
  382:         true -> " -name ";
  383:         false -> " -sname "
  384:     end.
  385: 
  386: % get the localhost's name, depending on the using name policy
  387: gethostname() ->
  388:     Hostname = case net_kernel:longnames() of
  389:        true->
  390:            net_adm:localhost();
  391:        _->
  392:            {ok, Name}=inet:gethostname(),
  393:            Name
  394:     end,
  395:     list_to_atom(Hostname).
  396: 
  397: %% Test that pinging an illegal nodename does not kill the node.
  398: illegal_nodenames(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  399:     run_dist_configs(fun illegal_nodenames/2, Config).
  400: 
  401: illegal_nodenames(DCfg, _Config) ->
  402:     {ok, Node}=start_node(DCfg, illegal_nodenames),
  403:     monitor_node(Node, true),
  404:     RPid=rpc:call(Node, erlang, spawn,
  405: 		  [?MODULE, pinger, [self()]]),
  406:     receive
  407: 	{RPid, pinged} ->
  408:             monitor_node(Node, false),
  409: 	    ok;
  410: 	{nodedown, Node} ->
  411: 	    ct:fail("Remote node died.")
  412:     end,
  413:     stop_node(Node),
  414:     ok.
  415: 
  416: pinger(Starter) ->
  417:     io:format("Starter:~p~n",[Starter]),
  418:     net_adm:ping(a@b@c),
  419:     Starter ! {self(), pinged},
  420:     ok.
  421: 
  422: 
  423: %% Test that you can set the net_setuptime properly.
  424: net_setuptime(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  425:     run_dist_configs(fun net_setuptime/2, Config).
  426: 
  427: net_setuptime(DCfg, _Config) ->
  428: 
  429:     %% In this test case, we reluctantly accept shorter times than the given
  430:     %% setup time, because the connection attempt can end in a
  431:     %% "Host unreachable" error before the timeout fires.
  432: 
  433:     Res0 = do_test_setuptime(DCfg, "2"),
  434:     io:format("Res0 = ~p", [Res0]),
  435:     true = (Res0 =< 4000),
  436:     Res1 = do_test_setuptime(DCfg, "0.3"),
  437:     io:format("Res1 = ~p", [Res1]),
  438:     true = (Res1 =< 500),
  439:     ok.
  440: 
  441: do_test_setuptime(DCfg, Setuptime) when is_list(Setuptime) ->
  442:     {ok, Node} = start_node(DCfg, dist_setuptime_test,
  443:                             "-kernel net_setuptime " ++ Setuptime),
  444:     Res = rpc:call(Node,?MODULE,time_ping,[?DUMMY_NODE]),
  445:     stop_node(Node),
  446:     Res.
  447: 
  448: time_ping(Node) ->
  449:     T0 = erlang:monotonic_time(),
  450:     pang = net_adm:ping(Node),
  451:     T1 = erlang:monotonic_time(),
  452:     erlang:convert_time_unit(T1 - T0, native, millisecond).
  453: 
  454: %% Keep the connection with the client node up.
  455: %% This is necessary as the client node runs with much shorter
  456: %% tick time !!
  457: keep_conn(Node) ->
  458:     sleep(1),
  459:     rpc:cast(Node, erlang, time, []),
  460:     keep_conn(Node).
  461: 
  462: tick_serv_test(Node, MasterNode) ->
  463:     spawn(erl_distribution_SUITE, keep_conn, [MasterNode]),
  464:     spawn(erl_distribution_SUITE, tick_serv_test1, [Node]).
  465: 
  466: tick_serv_test1(Node) ->
  467:     register(tick_serv, self()),
  468:     TestServer = receive {i_want_the_result, TS} -> TS end,
  469:     monitor_node(Node, true),
  470:     receive
  471: 	{nodedown, Node} ->
  472: 	    net_adm:ping(Node), %% Set up the connection again !!
  473: 
  474: 	    {tick_test, Node} ! {whats_the_result, self()},
  475: 	    receive
  476: 		{tick_test, Res} ->
  477: 		    TestServer ! {tick_test, Res}
  478: 	    end
  479:     end.
  480: 
  481: tick_cli_test(Node, Min, Max) ->
  482:     spawn(erl_distribution_SUITE, tick_cli_test1, [Node, Min, Max]).
  483: 
  484: tick_cli_test1(Node, Min, Max) ->
  485:     register(tick_test, self()),
  486:     erlang:monitor_node(Node, true),
  487:     sleep(2),
  488:     rpc:call(Node, erlang, time, []), %% simulate action on the connection
  489:     T1 = erlang:monotonic_time(),
  490:     receive
  491: 	{nodedown, Node} ->
  492: 	    T2 = erlang:monotonic_time(),
  493: 	    receive
  494: 		{whats_the_result, From} ->
  495: 		    Diff = erlang:convert_time_unit(T2-T1, native,
  496: 						    millisecond),
  497: 		    case Diff of
  498: 			T when Min =< T, T =< Max ->
  499: 			    From ! {tick_test, T};
  500: 			T ->
  501: 			    From ! {tick_test,
  502: 				    {"T not in interval "
  503:                                      ++ integer_to_list(Min)
  504:                                      ++ " =< T =< "
  505:                                      ++ integer_to_list(Max),
  506: 				     T}}
  507: 		    end
  508: 	    end
  509:     end.
  510: 
  511: epmd_reconnect(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  512:     NodeNames = [N1,N2,N3] = get_nodenames(3, ?FUNCTION_NAME),
  513:     Nodes = [atom_to_list(full_node_name(NN)) || NN <- NodeNames],
  514: 
  515:     DCfg = "-epmd_port "++?ALT_EPMD_PORT,
  516: 
  517:     {_N1F,Port1} = start_node_unconnected(DCfg, N1, ?MODULE, run_remote_test,
  518: 					["epmd_reconnect_do", atom_to_list(node()), "1" | Nodes]),
  519:     {_N2F,Port2} = start_node_unconnected(DCfg, N2, ?MODULE, run_remote_test,
  520: 					["epmd_reconnect_do", atom_to_list(node()), "2" | Nodes]),
  521:     {_N3F,Port3} = start_node_unconnected(DCfg, N3, ?MODULE, run_remote_test,
  522: 					["epmd_reconnect_do", atom_to_list(node()), "3" | Nodes]),
  523:     Ports = [Port1, Port2, Port3],
  524: 
  525:     ok = reap_ports(Ports),
  526:    
  527:     ok.
  528: 
  529: reap_ports([]) ->
  530:     ok;
  531: reap_ports(Ports) ->
  532:     case (receive M -> M end) of
  533: 	{Port, Message} ->
  534:             case lists:member(Port, Ports) andalso Message of
  535:                 {data,String} ->
  536:                     io:format("~p: ~s\n", [Port, String]),
  537:                     reap_ports(Ports);
  538:                 {exit_status,0} ->
  539:                     reap_ports(Ports -- [Port])
  540:             end
  541:     end.
  542:     
  543: epmd_reconnect_do(_Node, ["1", Node1, Node2, Node3]) ->
  544:     Names = [Name || Name <- [hd(string:tokens(Node, "@")) || Node <- [Node1, Node2, Node3]]],
  545:     %% wait until all nodes are registered
  546:     ok = wait_for_names(Names),
  547:     "Killed" ++_ = os:cmd(?ALT_EPMD_CMD++" -kill"),
  548:     open_port({spawn, ?ALT_EPMD_CMD}, []),
  549:     %% check that all nodes reregister with epmd
  550:     ok = wait_for_names(Names),
  551:     lists:foreach(fun(Node) ->
  552:                           ANode = list_to_atom(Node),
  553:                           pong = net_adm:ping(ANode),
  554:                           {epmd_reconnect_do, ANode} ! {stop, Node1, Node}
  555:                   end, [Node2, Node3]),
  556:     ok;
  557: epmd_reconnect_do(_Node, ["2", Node1, Node2, _Node3]) ->
  558:     register(epmd_reconnect_do, self()),
  559:     receive {stop, Node1, Node2} ->
  560:             ok
  561:     after 7000 ->
  562:             exit(timeout)
  563:     end;
  564: epmd_reconnect_do(_Node, ["3", Node1, _Node2, Node3]) ->
  565:     register(epmd_reconnect_do, self()),
  566:     receive {stop, Node1, Node3} ->
  567:             ok
  568:     after 7000 ->
  569:             exit(timeout)
  570:     end.
  571: 
  572: wait_for_names(Names) ->
  573:     %% wait for up to 3 seconds (the current retry timer in erl_epmd is 2s)
  574:     wait_for_names(lists:sort(Names), 30, 100).
  575: 
  576: wait_for_names(Names, N, Wait) when N > 0 ->
  577:     try
  578:         {ok, Info} = erl_epmd:names(),
  579:         Names = lists:sort([Name || {Name, _Port} <- Info]),
  580:         ok
  581:     catch
  582:         error:{badmatch, _} ->
  583:             timer:sleep(Wait),
  584:             wait_for_names(Names, N-1, Wait)
  585:     end.
  586: 
  587: 
  588: dyn_node_name(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  589:     run_dist_configs(fun dyn_node_name/2, Config).
  590: 
  591: dyn_node_name(DCfg, _Config) ->
  592:     NameDomain = case net_kernel:get_state() of
  593:                      #{name_domain := shortnames} -> "shortnames";
  594:                      #{name_domain := longnames} -> "longnames"
  595:                  end,
  596:     {_N1F,Port1} = start_node_unconnected(DCfg,
  597:                                           undefined, ?MODULE, run_remote_test,
  598:                                           ["dyn_node_name_do", atom_to_list(node()),
  599:                                            NameDomain]),
  600:     0 = wait_for_port_exit(Port1),
  601:     ok.
  602: 
  603: dyn_node_name_do(TestNode, [NameDomainStr]) ->
  604:     nonode@nohost = node(),
  605:     [] = nodes(),
  606:     [] = nodes(hidden),
  607:     NameDomain = list_to_atom(NameDomainStr),
  608:     #{started := static, name_type := dynamic, name := undefined,
  609:      name_domain := NameDomain} = net_kernel:get_state(),
  610:     net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true, [{node_type,all}]),
  611:     net_kernel:connect_node(TestNode),
  612:     [] = nodes(),
  613:     [TestNode] = nodes(hidden),
  614:     MyName = node(),
  615:     false = (MyName =:= undefined),
  616:     false = (MyName =:= nonode@nohost),
  617:     #{started := static, name_type := dynamic, name := MyName,
  618:       name_domain := NameDomain} = net_kernel:get_state(),
  619:     check([MyName], rpc:call(TestNode, erlang, nodes, [hidden])),
  620: 
  621:     {nodeup, MyName, [{node_type, visible}]} = receive_any(),
  622:     {nodeup, TestNode, [{node_type, hidden}]} = receive_any(),
  623: 
  624:     true = net_kernel:disconnect(TestNode),
  625: 
  626:     %% We don't know the order of these nodedown messages. Often
  627:     %% nodedown from the connection comes first, but not always...
  628: 
  629:     NodedownMsgsA = lists:sort([{nodedown, TestNode, [{node_type, hidden}]},
  630:                                 {nodedown, MyName, [{node_type, visible}]}]),
  631:     NodedownMsgA1 = receive_any(),
  632:     NodedownMsgA2 = receive_any(),
  633:     NodedownMsgsA = lists:sort([NodedownMsgA1, NodedownMsgA2]),
  634: 
  635:     [] = nodes(hidden),
  636:     nonode@nohost = node(),
  637:     #{started := static, name_type := dynamic, name := undefined,
  638:       name_domain := NameDomain} = net_kernel:get_state(),
  639: 
  640:     net_kernel:connect_node(TestNode),
  641:     [] = nodes(),
  642:     [TestNode] = nodes(hidden),
  643:     MyName = node(),
  644:     #{started := static, name_type := dynamic, name := MyName,
  645:       name_domain := NameDomain} = net_kernel:get_state(),
  646: 
  647:     check([MyName], rpc:call(TestNode, erlang, nodes, [hidden])),
  648: 
  649:     {nodeup, MyName, [{node_type, visible}]} = receive_any(),
  650:     {nodeup, TestNode, [{node_type, hidden}]} = receive_any(),
  651: 
  652:     true = rpc:cast(TestNode, net_kernel, disconnect, [MyName]),
  653: 
  654:     %% We don't know the order of these nodedown messages. Often
  655:     %% nodedown from the connection comes first, but not always...
  656: 
  657:     NodedownMsgsB = lists:sort([{nodedown, TestNode, [{node_type, hidden}]},
  658:                                 {nodedown, MyName, [{node_type, visible}]}]),
  659:     NodedownMsgB1 = receive_any(),
  660:     NodedownMsgB2 = receive_any(),
  661:     NodedownMsgsB = lists:sort([NodedownMsgB1, NodedownMsgB2]),
  662: 
  663:     [] = nodes(hidden),
  664:     nonode@nohost = node(),
  665:     #{started := static, name_type := dynamic, name := undefined,
  666:       name_domain := NameDomain} = net_kernel:get_state(),
  667:     ok.
  668: 
  669: check(X, X) -> ok.
  670: 
  671: setopts(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  672:     run_dist_configs(fun setopts/2, Config).
  673: 
  674: setopts(DCfg, _Config) ->
  675:     register(setopts_regname, self()),
  676:     [N1,N2,N3,N4,N5] = get_nodenames(5, setopts),
  677: 
  678:     {_N1F,Port1} = start_node_unconnected(DCfg, N1, ?MODULE, run_remote_test,
  679: 					["setopts_do", atom_to_list(node()), "1", "ping"]),
  680:     0 = wait_for_port_exit(Port1),
  681: 
  682:     {_N2F,Port2} = start_node_unconnected(DCfg, N2, ?MODULE, run_remote_test,
  683: 				 ["setopts_do", atom_to_list(node()), "2", "ping"]),
  684:     0 = wait_for_port_exit(Port2),
  685: 
  686:     {ok, LSock} = gen_tcp:listen(0, [{packet,2}, {active,false}]),
  687:     {ok, LTcpPort} = inet:port(LSock),
  688: 
  689:     {N3F,Port3} = start_node_unconnected(DCfg, N3, ?MODULE, run_remote_test,
  690: 					["setopts_do", atom_to_list(node()),
  691: 					 "1", integer_to_list(LTcpPort)]),
  692:     wait_and_connect(LSock, N3F, Port3),
  693:     0 = wait_for_port_exit(Port3),
  694: 
  695:     {N4F,Port4} = start_node_unconnected(DCfg, N4, ?MODULE, run_remote_test,
  696: 					["setopts_do", atom_to_list(node()),
  697: 					 "2", integer_to_list(LTcpPort)]),
  698:     wait_and_connect(LSock, N4F, Port4),
  699:     0 = wait_for_port_exit(Port4),
  700: 
  701:     %% net_kernel:setopts(new, _) used to be able to produce a deadlock
  702:     %% in net_kernel. GH-6129/OTP-18198
  703:     {N5F,Port5} = start_node_unconnected(DCfg, N5, ?MODULE, run_remote_test,
  704: 					["setopts_deadlock_test", atom_to_list(node()),
  705: 					 integer_to_list(LTcpPort)]),
  706:     wait_and_connect(LSock, N5F, Port5),
  707:     repeat(fun () ->
  708:                    receive after 10 -> ok end,
  709:                    erlang:disconnect_node(N5F),
  710:                    WD = spawn_link(fun () ->
  711:                                            receive after 2000 -> ok end,
  712:                                            exit({net_kernel_probably_deadlocked, N5F})
  713:                                    end),
  714:                    pong = net_adm:ping(N5F),
  715:                    unlink(WD),
  716:                    exit(WD, kill),
  717:                    false = is_process_alive(WD)
  718:            end,
  719:            200),
  720:     try
  721:         erpc:call(N5F, erlang, halt, [])
  722:     catch
  723:         error:{erpc,noconnection} -> ok
  724:     end,
  725:     0 = wait_for_port_exit(Port5),
  726: 
  727:     unregister(setopts_regname),
  728:     ok.
  729: 
  730: wait_and_connect(LSock, NodeName, NodePort) ->
  731:     {ok, Sock} = gen_tcp:accept(LSock),
  732:     {ok, "Connect please"} = gen_tcp:recv(Sock, 0),
  733:     flush_from_port(NodePort),
  734:     pong = net_adm:ping(NodeName),
  735:     gen_tcp:send(Sock, "Connect done"),
  736:     gen_tcp:close(Sock).
  737: 
  738: 
  739: flush_from_port(Port) ->
  740:     flush_from_port(Port, 10).
  741: 
  742: flush_from_port(Port, Timeout) ->
  743:     receive
  744: 	{Port,{data,String}} ->
  745: 	    io:format("~p: ~s\n", [Port, String]),
  746: 	    flush_from_port(Port, Timeout)
  747:     after Timeout ->
  748: 	    timeout
  749:     end.
  750: 
  751: wait_for_port_exit(Port) ->
  752:     case (receive M -> M end) of
  753: 	{Port,{exit_status,Status}} ->
  754: 	    Status;
  755: 	{Port,{data,String}} ->
  756: 	    io:format("~p: ~s\n", [Port, String]),
  757: 	    wait_for_port_exit(Port)
  758:     end.
  759: 
  760: run_remote_test([FuncStr, TestNodeStr | Args]) ->
  761:     Status = try
  762: 	io:format("Node ~p started~n", [node()]),
  763: 	TestNode = list_to_atom(TestNodeStr),
  764: 	io:format("Node ~p spawning function ~p~n", [node(), FuncStr]),
  765: 	{Pid,Ref} = spawn_monitor(?MODULE, list_to_atom(FuncStr), [TestNode, Args]),
  766: 	io:format("Node ~p waiting for function ~p~n", [node(), FuncStr]),
  767: 	receive
  768: 	    {'DOWN', Ref, process, Pid, normal} ->
  769: 		0;
  770: 	    Other ->
  771: 		io:format("Node ~p got unexpected msg: ~p\n",[node(), Other]),
  772: 		1
  773: 	end
  774:     catch
  775: 	C:E:S ->
  776: 	    io:format("Node ~p got EXCEPTION ~p:~p\nat ~p\n",
  777: 		      [node(), C, E, S]),
  778: 	    2
  779:     end,
  780:     io:format("Node ~p doing halt(~p).\n",[node(), Status]),
  781:     erlang:halt(Status).
  782: 
  783: % Do the actual test on the remote node
  784: setopts_do(TestNode, [OptNr, ConnectData]) ->
  785:     [] = nodes(),
  786:     {Opt, Val} = opt_from_nr(OptNr),
  787:     ok = net_kernel:setopts(new, [{Opt, Val}]),
  788: 
  789:     [] = nodes(),
  790:     {error, noconnection} = net_kernel:getopts(TestNode, [Opt]),
  791: 
  792:     case ConnectData of
  793: 	"ping" ->  % We connect
  794: 	    net_adm:ping(TestNode);
  795: 	TcpPort -> % Other connect
  796: 	    {ok, Sock} = gen_tcp:connect("localhost", list_to_integer(TcpPort),
  797: 					 [{active,false},{packet,2}]),
  798: 	    ok = gen_tcp:send(Sock, "Connect please"),
  799: 	    {ok, "Connect done"} = gen_tcp:recv(Sock, 0),
  800: 	    gen_tcp:close(Sock)
  801:     end,
  802:     [TestNode] = nodes(),
  803:     {ok, [{Opt,Val}]} = net_kernel:getopts(TestNode, [Opt]),
  804:     {error, noconnection} = net_kernel:getopts('pixie@fairyland', [Opt]),
  805: 
  806:     NewVal = change_val(Val),
  807:     ok = net_kernel:setopts(TestNode, [{Opt, NewVal}]),
  808:     {ok, [{Opt,NewVal}]} = net_kernel:getopts(TestNode, [Opt]),
  809: 
  810:     ok = net_kernel:setopts(TestNode, [{Opt, Val}]),
  811:     {ok, [{Opt,Val}]} = net_kernel:getopts(TestNode, [Opt]),
  812: 
  813:     ok.
  814: 
  815: setopts_deadlock_test(_TestNode, [TcpPort]) ->
  816:     {ok, Sock} = gen_tcp:connect("localhost", list_to_integer(TcpPort),
  817:                                  [{active,false},{packet,2}]),
  818:     ok = gen_tcp:send(Sock, "Connect please"),
  819:     {ok, "Connect done"} = gen_tcp:recv(Sock, 0),
  820:     gen_tcp:close(Sock),
  821:     setopts_new_loop().
  822:     
  823: setopts_new_loop() ->
  824:     ok = net_kernel:setopts(new, [{nodelay, true}]),
  825:     receive after 10 -> ok end,
  826:     setopts_new_loop().
  827:     
  828: opt_from_nr("1") -> {nodelay, true};
  829: opt_from_nr("2") -> {nodelay, false}.
  830: 
  831: change_val(true)  -> false;
  832: change_val(false) -> true.
  833: 
  834: 
  835: start_node_unconnected(DCfg, Name, Mod, Func, Args) ->
  836:     start_node_unconnected(DCfg, Name, erlang:get_cookie(), Mod, Func, Args).
  837: 
  838: start_node_unconnected(DCfg, Name, Cookie, Mod, Func, Args) ->
  839:     FullName = full_node_name(Name),
  840:     CmdLine =
  841:         mk_node_cmdline(DCfg, Name, Cookie, Mod, Func, Args),
  842:     io:format("Starting node ~p: ~s~n", [FullName, CmdLine]),
  843:     case open_port({spawn, CmdLine}, [exit_status]) of
  844: 	Port when is_port(Port) ->
  845: 	    {FullName, Port};
  846: 	Error ->
  847: 	    exit({failed_to_start_node, FullName, Error})
  848:     end.
  849: 
  850: full_node_name(PreName) when is_atom(PreName) ->
  851:     full_node_name(atom_to_list(PreName));
  852: full_node_name(PreNameL) when is_list(PreNameL) ->
  853:     HostSuffix = lists:dropwhile(fun ($@) -> false; (_) -> true end,
  854: 				 atom_to_list(node())),
  855:     list_to_atom(PreNameL ++ HostSuffix).
  856: 
  857: mk_node_cmdline(DCfg, Name, Cookie, Mod, Func, Args) ->
  858:     Static = "-noinput",
  859:     Pa = filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
  860:     Prog = case catch init:get_argument(progname) of
  861: 	       {ok,[[P]]} -> P;
  862: 	       _ -> exit(no_progname_argument_found)
  863: 	   end,
  864:     NameSw = case net_kernel:longnames() of
  865: 		 false -> "-sname ";
  866: 		 true -> "-name ";
  867: 		 _ -> exit(not_distributed_node)
  868: 	     end,
  869:     {ok, Pwd} = file:get_cwd(),
  870:     NameStr = atom_to_list(Name),
  871:     Prog ++ " "
  872: 	++ Static ++ " "
  873: 	++ NameSw ++ " " ++ NameStr
  874:         ++ " " ++ DCfg
  875: 	++ " -pa " ++ Pa
  876: 	++ " -env ERL_CRASH_DUMP " ++ Pwd ++ "/erl_crash_dump." ++ NameStr
  877: 	++ " -setcookie " ++ atom_to_list(Cookie)
  878: 	++ " -run " ++ atom_to_list(Mod) ++ " " ++ atom_to_list(Func)
  879: 	++ " " ++ string:join(Args, " ").
  880: 
  881: 
  882: %% OTP-4255.
  883: tick_change(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  884:     run_dist_configs(fun tick_change/2, Config).
  885: 
  886: tick_change(DCfg, _Config) ->
  887:     %%
  888:     %% This test case use disabled "connect all" so that
  889:     %% global wont interfere...
  890:     %%
  891:     [BN, CN] = get_nodenames(2, tick_change),
  892:     DefaultTT = net_kernel:get_net_ticktime(),
  893:     unchanged = net_kernel:set_net_ticktime(DefaultTT, 60),
  894:     case DefaultTT of
  895: 	I when is_integer(I) -> ok;
  896: 	_                 -> ct:fail(DefaultTT)
  897:     end,
  898: 
  899:     %% In case other nodes are connected
  900:     case nodes(connected) of
  901: 	[] -> net_kernel:set_net_ticktime(10, 0);
  902: 	_ ->  rpc:multicall(nodes([this, connected]), net_kernel,
  903: 			    set_net_ticktime, [10, 5])
  904:     end,
  905: 
  906:     wait_until(fun () -> 10 == net_kernel:get_net_ticktime() end),
  907:     {ok, B} = start_node(DCfg, BN, "-kernel net_ticktime 10 -connect_all false"),
  908:     {ok, C} = start_node(DCfg, CN, "-kernel net_ticktime 10 -hidden"),
  909: 
  910:     OTE = process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  911:     case catch begin
  912: 		   run_tick_change_test(DCfg, B, C, 10, 1),
  913: 		   run_tick_change_test(DCfg, B, C, 1, 10)
  914: 	       end of
  915: 	{'EXIT', Reason} ->
  916: 	    stop_node(B),
  917: 	    stop_node(C),
  918: 	    %% In case other nodes are connected
  919: 	    case nodes(connected) of
  920: 		[] -> net_kernel:set_net_ticktime(DefaultTT, 0);
  921: 		_ ->  rpc:multicall(nodes([this, connected]), net_kernel,
  922: 				    set_net_ticktime, [DefaultTT, 10])
  923: 	    end,
  924: 	    wait_until(fun () ->
  925: 			       DefaultTT == net_kernel:get_net_ticktime()
  926: 		       end),
  927: 	    process_flag(trap_exit, OTE),
  928: 	    ct:fail(Reason);
  929: 	_ ->
  930: 	    ok
  931:     end,
  932:     process_flag(trap_exit, OTE),
  933:     stop_node(B),
  934:     stop_node(C),
  935: 
  936:     %% In case other nodes are connected
  937:     case nodes(connected) of
  938: 	[] -> net_kernel:set_net_ticktime(DefaultTT, 0);
  939: 	_ ->  rpc:multicall(nodes([this, connected]), net_kernel,
  940: 			    set_net_ticktime, [DefaultTT, 5])
  941:     end,
  942: 
  943:     wait_until(fun () -> DefaultTT == net_kernel:get_net_ticktime() end),
  944:     ok.
  945: 
  946: 
  947: wait_for_nodedowns(Tester, Ref) ->
  948:     receive
  949: 	{nodedown, Node} ->
  950: 	    io:format("~p~n", [{node(), {nodedown, Node}}]),
  951: 	    Tester ! {Ref, {node(), {nodedown, Node}}}
  952:     end,
  953:     wait_for_nodedowns(Tester, Ref).
  954: 
  955: run_tick_change_test(DCfg, B, C, PrevTT, TT) ->
  956:     [DN, EN] = get_nodenames(2, tick_change),
  957: 
  958:     Tester = self(),
  959:     Ref = make_ref(),
  960:     MonitorNodes = fun (Nodes) ->
  961: 			   lists:foreach(
  962: 			     fun (N) ->
  963: 				     monitor_node(N,true)
  964: 			     end,
  965: 			     Nodes),
  966: 			   wait_for_nodedowns(Tester, Ref)
  967: 		   end,
  968: 
  969:     {ok, D} = start_node(DCfg, DN, "-connect_all false -kernel net_ticktime "
  970: 			 ++ integer_to_list(PrevTT)),
  971: 
  972:     NMA = spawn_link(fun () -> MonitorNodes([B, C, D]) end),
  973:     NMB = spawn_link(B, fun () -> MonitorNodes([node(), C, D]) end),
  974:     NMC = spawn_link(C, fun () -> MonitorNodes([node(), B, D]) end),
  975: 
  976:     MaxTT = case PrevTT > TT of
  977: 		true  -> PrevTT;
  978: 		false -> TT
  979: 	    end,
  980: 
  981:     CheckResult = make_ref(),
  982:     spawn_link(fun () ->
  983: 		       receive
  984: 		       after (25 + MaxTT)*1000 ->
  985: 			       Tester ! CheckResult
  986: 		       end
  987: 	       end),
  988: 
  989:     %% In case other nodes than these are connected
  990:     case nodes(connected) -- [B, C, D] of
  991: 	[] -> ok;
  992: 	OtherNodes -> rpc:multicall(OtherNodes, net_kernel,
  993: 				    set_net_ticktime, [TT, 20])
  994:     end,
  995: 
  996:     change_initiated = net_kernel:set_net_ticktime(TT,20),
  997:     {ongoing_change_to,_} = net_kernel:set_net_ticktime(TT,20),
  998:     sleep(3),
  999:     change_initiated = rpc:call(B,net_kernel,set_net_ticktime,[TT,15]),
 1000:     sleep(7),
 1001:     change_initiated = rpc:call(C,net_kernel,set_net_ticktime,[TT,10]),
 1002: 
 1003:     {ok, E} = start_node(DCfg, EN, "-connect_all false -kernel net_ticktime "
 1004: 			 ++ integer_to_list(TT)),
 1005:     NME  = spawn_link(E, fun () -> MonitorNodes([node(), B, C, D]) end),
 1006:     NMA2 = spawn_link(fun () -> MonitorNodes([E]) end),
 1007:     NMB2 = spawn_link(B, fun () -> MonitorNodes([E]) end),
 1008:     NMC2 = spawn_link(C, fun () -> MonitorNodes([E]) end),
 1009: 
 1010:     receive CheckResult -> ok end,
 1011: 
 1012:     unlink(NMA),  exit(NMA, kill),
 1013:     unlink(NMB),  exit(NMB, kill),
 1014:     unlink(NMC),  exit(NMC, kill),
 1015:     unlink(NME),  exit(NME, kill),
 1016:     unlink(NMA2), exit(NMA2, kill),
 1017:     unlink(NMB2), exit(NMB2, kill),
 1018:     unlink(NMC2), exit(NMC2, kill),
 1019: 
 1020:     %% The node not changing ticktime should have been disconnected from the
 1021:     %% other nodes
 1022:     receive {Ref, {Node, {nodedown, D}}} when Node == node() -> ok
 1023:     after 0 -> exit({?LINE, no_nodedown})
 1024:     end,
 1025:     receive {Ref, {B, {nodedown, D}}} -> ok
 1026:     after 0 -> exit({?LINE, no_nodedown})
 1027:     end,
 1028:     receive {Ref, {C, {nodedown, D}}} -> ok
 1029:     after 0 -> exit({?LINE, no_nodedown})
 1030:     end,
 1031:     receive {Ref, {E, {nodedown, D}}} -> ok
 1032:     after 0 -> exit({?LINE, no_nodedown})
 1033:     end,
 1034: 
 1035:     %% No other connections should have been broken
 1036:     receive
 1037: 	{Ref, Reason} ->
 1038: 	    stop_node(E),
 1039: 	    exit({?LINE, Reason});
 1040: 	{'EXIT', Pid, Reason} when Pid == NMA;
 1041: 				   Pid == NMB;
 1042: 				   Pid == NMC;
 1043: 				   Pid == NME;
 1044: 				   Pid == NMA2;
 1045: 				   Pid == NMB2;
 1046: 				   Pid == NMC2 ->
 1047: 	    stop_node(E),
 1048: 
 1049: 	    exit({?LINE, {node(Pid), Reason}})
 1050:     after 0 ->
 1051: 	    TT = net_kernel:get_net_ticktime(),
 1052: 	    TT = rpc:call(B, net_kernel, get_net_ticktime, []),
 1053: 	    TT = rpc:call(C, net_kernel, get_net_ticktime, []),
 1054: 	    TT = rpc:call(E, net_kernel, get_net_ticktime, []),
 1055: 	    stop_node(E),
 1056: 	    ok
 1057:     end.
 1058: 
 1059: %%
 1060: %% Basic tests of hidden node.
 1061: %%
 1062: %% Basic test of hidden node.
 1063: hidden_node(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1064:     run_dist_configs(fun hidden_node/2, Config).
 1065: 
 1066: hidden_node(DCfg, Config) ->
 1067:     hidden_node(DCfg, "-hidden", Config),
 1068:     hidden_node(DCfg, "-hidden -hidden", Config),
 1069:     hidden_node(DCfg, "-hidden true -hidden true", Config),
 1070:     ok.
 1071: 
 1072: hidden_node(DCfg, HArgs, _Config) ->
 1073:     ct:pal("--- Hidden argument(s): ~s~n", [HArgs]),
 1074:     {ok, V} = start_node(DCfg, visible_node),
 1075:     VMN = start_monitor_nodes_proc(V),
 1076:     {ok, H} = start_node(DCfg, hidden_node, HArgs),
 1077:     %% Connect visible_node -> hidden_node
 1078:     connect_nodes(V, H),
 1079:     test_nodes(V, H),
 1080:     stop_node(H),
 1081:     sleep(5),
 1082:     check_monitor_nodes_res(VMN, H),
 1083:     stop_node(V),
 1084:     {ok, H} = start_node(DCfg, hidden_node, HArgs),
 1085:     HMN = start_monitor_nodes_proc(H),
 1086:     {ok, V} = start_node(DCfg, visible_node),
 1087:     %% Connect hidden_node -> visible_node
 1088:     connect_nodes(H, V),
 1089:     test_nodes(V, H),
 1090:     stop_node(V),
 1091:     sleep(5),
 1092:     check_monitor_nodes_res(HMN, V),
 1093:     stop_node(H),
 1094:     ok.
 1095: 
 1096: connect_nodes(A, B) ->
 1097:     %% Check that they haven't already connected.
 1098:     false = lists:member(A, rpc:call(B, erlang, nodes, [connected])),
 1099:     false = lists:member(B, rpc:call(A, erlang, nodes, [connected])),
 1100:     %% Connect them.
 1101:     pong = rpc:call(A, net_adm, ping, [B]).
 1102: 
 1103: 
 1104: test_nodes(V, H) ->
 1105:     %% No nodes should be visible on hidden_node
 1106:     [] = rpc:call(H, erlang, nodes, []),
 1107:     %% visible_node should be hidden on hidden_node
 1108:     true = lists:member(V, rpc:call(H, erlang, nodes, [hidden])),
 1109:     %% hidden_node node shouldn't be visible on visible_node
 1110:     false = lists:member(H, rpc:call(V, erlang, nodes, [])),
 1111:     %% hidden_node should be hidden on visible_node
 1112:     true = lists:member(H, rpc:call(V, erlang, nodes, [hidden])).
 1113: 
 1114: mn_loop(MNs) ->
 1115:     receive
 1116: 	{nodeup, N} ->
 1117: 	    mn_loop([{nodeup, N}|MNs]);
 1118: 	{nodedown, N} ->
 1119: 	    mn_loop([{nodedown, N}|MNs]);
 1120: 	{monitor_nodes_result, Ref, From} ->
 1121: 	    From ! {Ref, MNs};
 1122: 	_ ->
 1123: 	    mn_loop(MNs)
 1124:     end.
 1125: 
 1126: start_monitor_nodes_proc(Node) ->
 1127:     Ref = make_ref(),
 1128:     Starter = self(),
 1129:     Pid = spawn(Node,
 1130: 		fun() ->
 1131: 			net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true),
 1132: 			Starter ! Ref,
 1133: 			mn_loop([])
 1134: 		end),
 1135:     receive
 1136: 	Ref ->
 1137: 	    ok
 1138:     end,
 1139:     Pid.
 1140: 
 1141: 
 1142: check_monitor_nodes_res(Pid, Node) ->
 1143:     Ref = make_ref(),
 1144:     Pid ! {monitor_nodes_result, Ref, self()},
 1145:     receive
 1146: 	{Ref, MNs} ->
 1147: 	    false = lists:keysearch(Node, 2, MNs)
 1148:     end.
 1149: 
 1150: 
 1151: 
 1152: %% Check the kernel inet_dist_{listen,connect}_options options.
 1153: inet_dist_options_options(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1154:     Prio = 1,
 1155:     case gen_udp:open(0, [{priority,Prio}]) of
 1156: 	{ok,Socket} ->
 1157: 	    case inet:getopts(Socket, [priority]) of
 1158: 		{ok,[{priority,Prio}]} ->
 1159: 		    ok = gen_udp:close(Socket),
 1160: 		    do_inet_dist_options_options(Prio);
 1161: 		_ ->
 1162: 		    ok = gen_udp:close(Socket),
 1163: 		    {skip,
 1164: 		     "Can not set priority "++integer_to_list(Prio)++
 1165: 			 " on socket"}
 1166: 	    end;
 1167: 	{error,_} ->
 1168: 	    {skip, "Can not set priority on socket"}
 1169:     end.
 1170: 
 1171: do_inet_dist_options_options(Prio) ->
 1172:     PriorityString0 = "[{priority,"++integer_to_list(Prio)++"}]",
 1173:     PriorityString =
 1174: 	case os:cmd("echo [{a,1}]") of
 1175: 	    "[{a,1}]"++_ ->
 1176: 		PriorityString0;
 1177: 	    _ ->
 1178: 		%% Some shells need quoting of [{}]
 1179: 		"'"++PriorityString0++"'"
 1180: 	end,
 1181:     InetDistOptions =
 1182: 	"-hidden "
 1183: 	"-kernel inet_dist_connect_options "++PriorityString++" "
 1184: 	"-kernel inet_dist_listen_options "++PriorityString,
 1185:     {ok,Node1} =
 1186: 	start_node("", inet_dist_options_1, InetDistOptions),
 1187:     {ok,Node2} =
 1188: 	start_node("", inet_dist_options_2, InetDistOptions),
 1189:     %%
 1190:     pong =
 1191: 	rpc:call(Node1, net_adm, ping, [Node2]),
 1192:     PrioritiesNode1 =
 1193: 	rpc:call(Node1, ?MODULE, get_socket_priorities, []),
 1194:     PrioritiesNode2 =
 1195: 	rpc:call(Node2, ?MODULE, get_socket_priorities, []),
 1196:     io:format("PrioritiesNode1 = ~p", [PrioritiesNode1]),
 1197:     io:format("PrioritiesNode2 = ~p", [PrioritiesNode2]),
 1198:     Elevated = [P || P <- PrioritiesNode1, P =:= Prio],
 1199:     Elevated = [P || P <- PrioritiesNode2, P =:= Prio],
 1200:     [_|_] = Elevated,
 1201:     %%
 1202:     stop_node(Node2),
 1203:     stop_node(Node1),
 1204:     ok.
 1205: 
 1206: get_socket_priorities() ->
 1207:     [Priority ||
 1208: 	{ok,[{priority,Priority}]} <-
 1209: 	    [inet:getopts(Port, [priority]) ||
 1210: 		Port <- erlang:ports(),
 1211: 		element(2, erlang:port_info(Port, name)) =:= "tcp_inet"]].
 1212: 
 1213: 
 1214: 
 1215: %% check net_ticker_spawn_options
 1216: net_ticker_spawn_options(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1217:     run_dist_configs(fun net_ticker_spawn_options/2, Config).
 1218: 
 1219: net_ticker_spawn_options(DCfg, Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1220:     FullsweepString0 = "[{fullsweep_after,0}]",
 1221:     FullsweepString =
 1222:         case os:cmd("echo [{a,1}]") of
 1223:             "[{a,1}]"++_ ->
 1224:                 FullsweepString0;
 1225:             _ ->
 1226:                 %% Some shells need quoting of [{}]
 1227:                 "'"++FullsweepString0++"'"
 1228:         end,
 1229:     InetDistOptions =
 1230:         "-hidden "
 1231:         "-kernel net_ticker_spawn_options "++FullsweepString,
 1232:     {ok,Node1} =
 1233:         start_node(DCfg, net_ticker_spawn_options_1, InetDistOptions),
 1234:     {ok,Node2} =
 1235:         start_node(DCfg, net_ticker_spawn_options_2, InetDistOptions),
 1236:     %%
 1237:     pong =
 1238:         erpc:call(Node1, net_adm, ping, [Node2]),
 1239:     FullsweepOptionNode1 =
 1240:         erpc:call(Node1, ?MODULE, get_net_ticker_fullsweep_option, [Node2]),
 1241:     FullsweepOptionNode2 =
 1242:         erpc:call(Node2, ?MODULE, get_net_ticker_fullsweep_option, [Node1]),
 1243:     io:format("FullsweepOptionNode1 = ~p", [FullsweepOptionNode1]),
 1244:     io:format("FullsweepOptionNode2 = ~p", [FullsweepOptionNode2]),
 1245:     0 = FullsweepOptionNode1,
 1246:     0 = FullsweepOptionNode2,
 1247:     %%
 1248:     stop_node(Node2),
 1249:     stop_node(Node1),
 1250:     ok.
 1251: 
 1252: get_net_ticker_fullsweep_option(Node) ->
 1253:     Links = case proplists:get_value(Node, erlang:system_info(dist_ctrl)) of
 1254:                 DistCtrl when is_port(DistCtrl) ->
 1255:                     {links, Ls} = erlang:port_info(DistCtrl, links),
 1256:                     Ls;
 1257:                 DistCtrl when is_pid(DistCtrl) ->
 1258:                     {links, Ls} = process_info(DistCtrl, links),
 1259:                     Ls
 1260:             end,
 1261:     Ticker = try
 1262:                  lists:foreach(
 1263:                    fun (Pid) when is_pid(Pid) ->
 1264:                            {current_stacktrace, Stk}
 1265:                                = process_info(Pid, current_stacktrace),
 1266:                            lists:foreach(
 1267:                              fun ({dist_util, con_loop, _, _}) ->
 1268:                                      throw(Pid);
 1269:                                  (_) ->
 1270:                                      ok
 1271:                              end, Stk);
 1272:                        (_) ->
 1273:                            ok
 1274:                    end, Links),
 1275:                  error(no_ticker_found)
 1276:              catch
 1277:                  throw:Pid when is_pid(Pid) -> Pid
 1278:              end,
 1279:     {garbage_collection, GCOpts} = erlang:process_info(Ticker, garbage_collection),
 1280:     proplists:get_value(fullsweep_after, GCOpts).
 1281: 
 1282: 
 1283: 
 1284: %%
 1285: %% Testcase:
 1286: %%   monitor_nodes_nodedown_reason
 1287: %%
 1288: 
 1289: monitor_nodes_nodedown_reason(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1290:     run_dist_configs(fun monitor_nodes_nodedown_reason/2, Config).
 1291: 
 1292: monitor_nodes_nodedown_reason(DCfg, _Config) ->
 1293:     MonNodeState = monitor_node_state(),
 1294:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true),
 1295:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true, [nodedown_reason]),
 1296: 
 1297:     Names = get_numbered_nodenames(5, node),
 1298:     [NN1, NN2, NN3, NN4, NN5] = Names,
 1299: 
 1300:     {ok, N1} = start_node(DCfg, NN1, "-connect_all false"),
 1301:     {ok, N2} = start_node(DCfg, NN2, "-connect_all false"),
 1302:     {ok, N3} = start_node(DCfg, NN3, "-connect_all false"),
 1303:     {ok, N4} = start_node(DCfg, NN4, "-hidden"),
 1304: 
 1305:     receive {nodeup, N1} -> ok end,
 1306:     receive {nodeup, N2} -> ok end,
 1307:     receive {nodeup, N3} -> ok end,
 1308: 
 1309:     receive {nodeup, N1, []} -> ok end,
 1310:     receive {nodeup, N2, []} -> ok end,
 1311:     receive {nodeup, N3, []} -> ok end,
 1312: 
 1313:     stop_node(N1),
 1314:     stop_node(N4),
 1315:     true = net_kernel:disconnect(N2),
 1316:     TickTime = net_kernel:get_net_ticktime(),
 1317:     SleepTime = TickTime + (TickTime div 2),
 1318:     spawn(N3, fun () ->
 1319: 		      block_emu(SleepTime*1000),
 1320: 		      halt()
 1321: 	      end),
 1322: 
 1323:     receive {nodedown, N1} -> ok end,
 1324:     receive {nodedown, N2} -> ok end,
 1325:     receive {nodedown, N3} -> ok end,
 1326: 
 1327:     receive {nodedown, N1, [{nodedown_reason, R1}]} -> connection_closed = R1 end,
 1328:     receive {nodedown, N2, [{nodedown_reason, R2}]} -> disconnect = R2 end,
 1329:     receive {nodedown, N3, [{nodedown_reason, R3}]} -> net_tick_timeout = R3 end,
 1330: 
 1331:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(false, [nodedown_reason]),
 1332: 
 1333:     {ok, N5} = start_node(DCfg, NN5),
 1334:     stop_node(N5),
 1335: 
 1336:     receive {nodeup, N5} -> ok end,
 1337:     receive {nodedown, N5} -> ok end,
 1338:     print_my_messages(),
 1339:     ok = check_no_nodedown_nodeup(1000),
 1340:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(false),
 1341:     MonNodeState = monitor_node_state(),
 1342:     ok.
 1343: 
 1344: 
 1345: monitor_nodes_complex_nodedown_reason(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1346:     run_dist_configs(fun monitor_nodes_complex_nodedown_reason/2, Config).
 1347: 
 1348: monitor_nodes_complex_nodedown_reason(DCfg, _Config) ->
 1349:     MonNodeState = monitor_node_state(),
 1350:     Me = self(),
 1351:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true, [nodedown_reason]),
 1352:     [Name] = get_nodenames(1, monitor_nodes_complex_nodedown_reason),
 1353:     {ok, Node} = start_node(DCfg, Name, ""),
 1354:     Pid = spawn(Node,
 1355: 		fun() ->
 1356: 			Me ! {stuff,
 1357: 			      self(),
 1358: 			      [make_ref(),
 1359: 			       {processes(), erlang:ports()}]}
 1360: 		end),
 1361:     receive {nodeup, Node, []} -> ok end,
 1362:     {ok, NodeInfo} = net_kernel:node_info(Node),
 1363:     {value,{owner, Owner}} = lists:keysearch(owner, 1, NodeInfo),
 1364:     ComplexTerm = receive {stuff, Pid, _} = Msg ->
 1365: 			  {Msg, term_to_binary(Msg)}
 1366: 		  end,
 1367:     exit(Owner, ComplexTerm),
 1368:     receive
 1369: 	{nodedown, Node, [{nodedown_reason, NodeDownReason}]} ->
 1370: 	    ok
 1371:     end,
 1372:     %% If the complex nodedown_reason messed something up garbage collections
 1373:     %% are likely to dump core
 1374:     garbage_collect(),
 1375:     garbage_collect(),
 1376:     garbage_collect(),
 1377:     ComplexTerm = NodeDownReason,
 1378:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(false, [nodedown_reason]),
 1379:     no_msgs(),
 1380:     MonNodeState = monitor_node_state(),
 1381:     ok.
 1382: 
 1383: 
 1384:

 1387: %% Testcase:
 1388: %%   monitor_nodes_node_type
 1389: %%
 1390: 
 1391: monitor_nodes_node_type(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1392:     run_dist_configs(fun monitor_nodes_node_type/2, Config).
 1393: 
 1394: monitor_nodes_node_type(DCfg, _Config) ->
 1395:     MonNodeState = monitor_node_state(),
 1396:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true),
 1397:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true, [{node_type, all}]),
 1398:     Names = get_numbered_nodenames(9, node),
 1399:     [NN1, NN2, NN3, NN4, NN5, NN6, NN7, NN8, NN9] = Names,
 1400: 
 1401:     {ok, N1} = start_node(DCfg, NN1),
 1402:     {ok, N2} = start_node(DCfg, NN2),
 1403:     {ok, N3} = start_node(DCfg, NN3, "-hidden"),
 1404:     {ok, N4} = start_node(DCfg, NN4, "-hidden"),
 1405: 
 1406:     receive {nodeup, N1} -> ok end,
 1407:     receive {nodeup, N2} -> ok end,
 1408: 
 1409:     receive {nodeup, N1, [{node_type, visible}]} -> ok end,
 1410:     receive {nodeup, N2, [{node_type, visible}]} -> ok end,
 1411:     receive {nodeup, N3, [{node_type, hidden}]} -> ok end,
 1412:     receive {nodeup, N4, [{node_type, hidden}]} -> ok end,
 1413: 
 1414:     stop_node(N1),
 1415:     stop_node(N2),
 1416:     stop_node(N3),
 1417:     stop_node(N4),
 1418: 
 1419:     receive {nodedown, N1} -> ok end,
 1420:     receive {nodedown, N2} -> ok end,
 1421: 
 1422:     receive {nodedown, N1, [{node_type, visible}]} -> ok end,
 1423:     receive {nodedown, N2, [{node_type, visible}]} -> ok end,
 1424:     receive {nodedown, N3, [{node_type, hidden}]} -> ok end,
 1425:     receive {nodedown, N4, [{node_type, hidden}]} -> ok end,
 1426: 
 1427:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(false, [{node_type, all}]),
 1428:     {ok, N5} = start_node(DCfg, NN5),
 1429: 
 1430:     receive {nodeup, N5} -> ok end,
 1431:     stop_node(N5),
 1432:     receive {nodedown, N5} -> ok end,
 1433: 
 1434:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true, [{node_type, hidden}]),
 1435:     {ok, N6} = start_node(DCfg, NN6),
 1436:     {ok, N7} = start_node(DCfg, NN7, "-hidden"),
 1437: 
 1438: 
 1439:     receive {nodeup, N6} -> ok end,
 1440:     receive {nodeup, N7, [{node_type, hidden}]} -> ok end,
 1441:     stop_node(N6),
 1442:     stop_node(N7),
 1443: 
 1444:     receive {nodedown, N6} -> ok end,
 1445:     receive {nodedown, N7, [{node_type, hidden}]} -> ok end,
 1446: 
 1447:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true, [{node_type, visible}]),
 1448:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(false, [{node_type, hidden}]),
 1449:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(false),
 1450: 
 1451:     {ok, N8} = start_node(DCfg, NN8),
 1452:     {ok, N9} = start_node(DCfg, NN9, "-hidden"),
 1453: 
 1454:     receive {nodeup, N8, [{node_type, visible}]} -> ok end,
 1455:     stop_node(N8),
 1456:     stop_node(N9),
 1457: 
 1458:     receive {nodedown, N8, [{node_type, visible}]} -> ok end,
 1459:     print_my_messages(),
 1460:     ok = check_no_nodedown_nodeup(1000),
 1461:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(false, [{node_type, visible}]),
 1462:     MonNodeState = monitor_node_state(),
 1463:     ok.
 1464:
