 1466: %%
 1467: %% Testcase:
 1468: %%   monitor_nodes
 1469: %%
 1470: 
 1471: monitor_nodes_misc(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1472:     run_dist_configs(fun monitor_nodes_misc/2, Config).
 1473: 
 1474: monitor_nodes_misc(DCfg, _Config) ->
 1475:     MonNodeState = monitor_node_state(),
 1476:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true),
 1477:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true, [{node_type, all}, nodedown_reason]),
 1478:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true, [nodedown_reason, {node_type, all}, connection_id]),
 1479:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true, #{node_type => all, nodedown_reason => true}),
 1480:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true, #{node_type => all, nodedown_reason => true, connection_id => true}),
 1481:     Names = get_numbered_nodenames(3, node),
 1482:     [NN1, NN2, NN3] = Names,
 1483: 
 1484:     {ok, N1} = start_node(DCfg, NN1),
 1485:     {ok, N2} = start_node(DCfg, NN2, "-hidden"),
 1486: 
 1487:     receive {nodeup, N1} -> ok end,
 1488: 
 1489:     receive {nodeup, N1, #{node_type := visible}} -> ok end,
 1490:     receive {nodeup, N2, #{node_type := hidden}} -> ok end,
 1491:     receive {nodeup, N1, [{node_type, visible}]} -> ok end,
 1492:     receive {nodeup, N2, [{node_type, hidden}]} -> ok end,
 1493: 
 1494:     NodesInfo = erlang:nodes(connected, #{connection_id => true}),
 1495: 
 1496:     {N1, #{connection_id := N1CId}} = lists:keyfind(N1, 1, NodesInfo),
 1497:     {N2, #{connection_id := N2CId}} = lists:keyfind(N2, 1, NodesInfo),
 1498: 
 1499:     ct:pal("N1: ~p ~p~n", [N1, N1CId]),
 1500:     ct:pal("N2: ~p ~p~n", [N2, N2CId]),
 1501: 
 1502:     receive {nodeup, N1, #{node_type := visible, connection_id := N1CId}} -> ok end,
 1503:     receive {nodeup, N2, #{node_type := hidden, connection_id := N2CId}} -> ok end,
 1504: 
 1505:     N1UpInfoSorted = lists:sort([{node_type, visible},{connection_id, N1CId}]),
 1506:     N2UpInfoSorted = lists:sort([{node_type, hidden},{connection_id, N2CId}]),
 1507: 
 1508:     receive {nodeup, N1, UpN1Info} -> N1UpInfoSorted = lists:sort(UpN1Info) end,
 1509:     receive {nodeup, N2, UpN2Info} -> N2UpInfoSorted = lists:sort(UpN2Info) end,
 1510: 
 1511:     stop_node(N1),
 1512:     stop_node(N2),
 1513: 
 1514:     receive {nodedown, N1} -> ok end,
 1515: 
 1516:     receive {nodedown, N1, #{node_type := visible,
 1517:                              nodedown_reason := connection_closed}} -> ok end,
 1518:     receive {nodedown, N1, #{node_type := visible,
 1519:                              nodedown_reason := connection_closed,
 1520:                              connection_id := N1CId}} -> ok end,
 1521:     receive {nodedown, N2, #{node_type := hidden,
 1522:                              nodedown_reason := connection_closed}} -> ok end,
 1523:     receive {nodedown, N2, #{node_type := hidden,
 1524:                              nodedown_reason := connection_closed,
 1525:                              connection_id := N2CId}} -> ok end,
 1526: 
 1527:     N1ADownInfoSorted = lists:sort([{node_type, visible},
 1528:                                     {nodedown_reason, connection_closed}]),
 1529:     N1BDownInfoSorted = lists:sort([{node_type, visible},
 1530:                                     {nodedown_reason, connection_closed},
 1531:                                     {connection_id, N1CId}]),
 1532:     N2ADownInfoSorted = lists:sort([{node_type, hidden},
 1533:                                     {nodedown_reason, connection_closed}]),
 1534:     N2BDownInfoSorted = lists:sort([{node_type, hidden},
 1535:                                     {nodedown_reason, connection_closed},
 1536:                                     {connection_id, N2CId}]),
 1537: 
 1538:     receive
 1539:         {nodedown, N1, N1Info1} ->
 1540:             case lists:sort(N1Info1) of
 1541:                 N1ADownInfoSorted ->
 1542:                     receive
 1543:                         {nodedown, N1, N1Info2} ->
 1544:                             N1BDownInfoSorted = lists:sort(N1Info2)
 1545:                     end;
 1546:                 N1BDownInfoSorted ->
 1547:                     receive
 1548:                         {nodedown, N1, N1Info2} ->
 1549:                             N1ADownInfoSorted = lists:sort(N1Info2)
 1550:                     end
 1551:             end
 1552:     end,
 1553:     receive
 1554:         {nodedown, N2, N2Info1} ->
 1555:             case lists:sort(N2Info1) of
 1556:                 N2ADownInfoSorted ->
 1557:                     receive
 1558:                         {nodedown, N2, N2Info2} ->
 1559:                             N2BDownInfoSorted = lists:sort(N2Info2)
 1560:                     end;
 1561:                 N2BDownInfoSorted ->
 1562:                     receive
 1563:                         {nodedown, N2, N2Info2} ->
 1564:                             N2ADownInfoSorted = lists:sort(N2Info2)
 1565:                     end
 1566:             end
 1567:     end,
 1568: 
 1569:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(false, [{node_type, all}, nodedown_reason]),
 1570:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(false, [nodedown_reason, {node_type, all}, connection_id]),
 1571:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(false, #{node_type => all, nodedown_reason => true}),
 1572:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(false, #{node_type => all, nodedown_reason => true, connection_id => true}),
 1573: 
 1574:     {ok, N3} = start_node(DCfg, NN3),
 1575:     receive {nodeup, N3} -> ok end,
 1576:     stop_node(N3),
 1577:     receive {nodedown, N3} -> ok end,
 1578:     print_my_messages(),
 1579:     ok = check_no_nodedown_nodeup(1000),
 1580:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(false),
 1581:     MonNodeState = monitor_node_state(),
 1582:     ok.
 1583: 
 1584: 
 1585: %% Tests that {nodeup, Node} messages are received before
 1586: %% messages from Node and that {nodedown, Node} messages are
 1587: %% received after messages from Node.
 1588: monitor_nodes_otp_6481(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1589:     run_dist_configs(fun monitor_nodes_otp_6481/2, Config).
 1590: 
 1591: monitor_nodes_otp_6481(DCfg, Config) ->
 1592:     io:format("Testing nodedown...~n"),
 1593:     ok = monitor_nodes_otp_6481_test(DCfg, Config, nodedown),
 1594:     io:format("ok~n"),
 1595:     io:format("Testing nodeup...~n"),
 1596:     ok = monitor_nodes_otp_6481_test(DCfg, Config, nodeup),
 1597:     io:format("ok~n"),
 1598:     ok.
 1599: 
 1600: kill_existing_nodes() ->
 1601:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true),
 1602:     kill_existing_nodes(nodes()),
 1603:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(false),
 1604:     ok.
 1605: 
 1606: kill_existing_nodes([]) -> ok;
 1607: kill_existing_nodes([Node | Nodes]) ->
 1608:     catch erpc:call(Node, erlang, halt, []),
 1609:     kill_existing_nodes(Nodes).
 1610: 
 1611: 
 1612: monitor_nodes_otp_6481_test(DCfg, Config, TestType) when is_list(Config) ->
 1613:     MonNodeState = monitor_node_state(),
 1614:     NodeMsg = make_ref(),
 1615:     Me = self(),
 1616:     [Name] = get_nodenames(1, monitor_nodes_otp_6481),
 1617:     case TestType of
 1618: 	nodedown -> ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true);
 1619: 	nodeup -> ok
 1620:     end,
 1621:     Seq = lists:seq(1,10000),
 1622:     MN = spawn_link(
 1623: 	   fun () ->
 1624: 		   lists:foreach(
 1625: 		     fun (_) ->
 1626: 			     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true)
 1627: 		     end,
 1628: 		     Seq),
 1629: 		   Me ! {mon_set, self()},
 1630: 		   receive after infinity -> ok end
 1631: 	   end),
 1632:     receive {mon_set, MN} -> ok end,
 1633:     case TestType of
 1634: 	nodedown -> ok;
 1635: 	nodeup -> ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true)
 1636:     end,
 1637: 
 1638:     %% Whitebox:
 1639:     %% nodedown test: Since this process was the first one monitoring
 1640:     %%                nodes this process will be the first one notified
 1641:     %%                on nodedown.
 1642:     %% nodeup test:   Since this process was the last one monitoring
 1643:     %%                nodes this process will be the last one notified
 1644:     %%                on nodeup
 1645: 
 1646:     %% Verify the monitor_nodes order expected
 1647:     TestMonNodeState = monitor_node_state(),
 1648:     %% io:format("~p~n", [TestMonNodeState]),
 1649:     TestMonNodeState =
 1650: 	case TestType of
 1651: 	    nodedown -> [];
 1652: 	    nodeup -> [{self(), []}]
 1653: 	end
 1654: 	++ lists:map(fun (_) -> {MN, []} end, Seq)
 1655: 	++ case TestType of
 1656: 	       nodedown -> [{self(), []}];
 1657: 	       nodeup -> []
 1658: 	   end
 1659: 	++ MonNodeState,
 1660: 
 1661:     {ok, Node} = start_node(DCfg, Name, "", this),
 1662:     receive {nodeup, Node} -> ok end,
 1663: 
 1664:     RemotePid = spawn(Node,
 1665: 		      fun () ->
 1666: 			      receive after 1500 -> ok end,
 1667: 			      %% infinite loop of msgs
 1668: 			      %% we want an endless stream of messages and the kill
 1669: 			      %% the node mercilessly.
 1670: 			      %% We then want to ensure that the nodedown message arrives
 1671: 			      %% last ... without garbage after it.
 1672: 			      _ = spawn(fun() -> node_loop_send(Me, NodeMsg, 1) end),
 1673: 			      receive {Me, kill_it} -> ok end,
 1674: 			      halt()
 1675: 		      end),
 1676: 
 1677:     net_kernel:disconnect(Node),
 1678:     receive {nodedown, Node} -> ok end,
 1679: 
 1680:     %% Verify that '{nodeup, Node}' comes before '{NodeMsg, 1}' (the message
 1681:     %% bringing up the connection).
 1682:     {nodeup, Node} = receive Msg1 -> Msg1 end,
 1683:     {NodeMsg, N}   = receive Msg2 -> Msg2 end,
 1684:     %% msg stream has begun, kill the node
 1685:     RemotePid ! {self(), kill_it},
 1686: 
 1687:     %% Verify that '{nodedown, Node}' comes after the last '{NodeMsg, N}'
 1688:     %% message.
 1689:     {nodedown, Node} = flush_node_msgs(NodeMsg, N+1),
 1690:     no_msgs(500),
 1691: 
 1692:     Mon = erlang:monitor(process, MN),
 1693:     unlink(MN),
 1694:     exit(MN, bang),
 1695:     receive {'DOWN', Mon, process, MN, bang} -> ok end,
 1696:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(false),
 1697:     MonNodeState = monitor_node_state(),
 1698:     ok.
 1699: 
 1700: flush_node_msgs(NodeMsg, No) ->
 1701:     case receive Msg -> Msg end of
 1702: 	{NodeMsg, N} when N >= No ->
 1703: 	    flush_node_msgs(NodeMsg, N+1);
 1704: 	OtherMsg ->
 1705: 	    OtherMsg
 1706:     end.
 1707: 
 1708: node_loop_send(Pid, Msg, No) ->
 1709:     Pid ! {Msg, No},
 1710:     node_loop_send(Pid, Msg, No + 1).
 1711: 
 1712: monitor_nodes_errors(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1713:     MonNodeState = monitor_node_state(),
 1714:     error = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(asdf),
 1715:     {error,
 1716:      {unknown_options,
 1717:       [gurka]}} = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true,
 1718: 					   [gurka]),
 1719:     {error,
 1720:      {unknown_options,
 1721:       #{gurka := true}}} = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true,
 1722:                                                     #{gurka => true}),
 1723:     {error,
 1724:      {invalid_options,
 1725:       gurka}} = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true,
 1726: 					 gurka),
 1727:     {error,
 1728:      {option_value_mismatch,
 1729:       [{node_type,visible},
 1730:        {node_type,hidden}]}}
 1731: 	= net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true,
 1732: 				   [{node_type,hidden},
 1733: 				    {node_type,visible}]),
 1734:     {error,
 1735:      {option_value_mismatch,
 1736:       [{node_type,visible},
 1737:        {node_type,all}]}}
 1738: 	= net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true,
 1739: 				   [{node_type,all},
 1740: 				    {node_type,visible}]),
 1741:     {error,
 1742:      {bad_option_value,
 1743:       {node_type,
 1744:        blaha}}}
 1745: 	= net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true, [{node_type, blaha}]),
 1746:     {error,
 1747:      {bad_option_value,
 1748:       #{node_type := blaha}}}
 1749: 	= net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true, #{node_type => blaha}),
 1750:     MonNodeState = monitor_node_state(),
 1751:     ok.
 1752: 
 1753: monitor_nodes_combinations(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1754:     run_dist_configs(fun monitor_nodes_combinations/2, Config).
 1755: 
 1756: monitor_nodes_combinations(DCfg, _Config) ->
 1757:     MonNodeState = monitor_node_state(),
 1758:     monitor_nodes_all_comb(true),
 1759:     [VisibleName, HiddenName] = get_nodenames(2,
 1760: 					      monitor_nodes_combinations),
 1761:     {ok, Visible} = start_node(DCfg, VisibleName, ""),
 1762:     receive_all_comb_nodeup_msgs(visible, Visible),
 1763:     no_msgs(),
 1764:     stop_node(Visible),
 1765:     receive_all_comb_nodedown_msgs(visible, Visible, connection_closed),
 1766:     no_msgs(),
 1767:     {ok, Hidden} = start_node(DCfg, HiddenName, "-hidden"),
 1768:     receive_all_comb_nodeup_msgs(hidden, Hidden),
 1769:     no_msgs(),
 1770:     stop_node(Hidden),
 1771:     receive_all_comb_nodedown_msgs(hidden, Hidden, connection_closed),
 1772:     no_msgs(),
 1773:     monitor_nodes_all_comb(false),
 1774:     MonNodeState = monitor_node_state(),
 1775:     no_msgs(),
 1776:     ok.
 1777: 
 1778: monitor_nodes_all_comb(Flag) ->
 1779:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(Flag),
 1780:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(Flag,
 1781: 				  [nodedown_reason]),
 1782:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(Flag,
 1783: 				  [{node_type, hidden}]),
 1784:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(Flag,
 1785: 				  [{node_type, visible}]),
 1786:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(Flag,
 1787: 				  [{node_type, all}]),
 1788:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(Flag,
 1789: 				  [nodedown_reason,
 1790: 				   {node_type, hidden}]),
 1791:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(Flag,
 1792: 				  [nodedown_reason,
 1793: 				   {node_type, visible}]),
 1794:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(Flag,
 1795: 				  [nodedown_reason,
 1796: 				   {node_type, all}]),
 1797:     %% There currently are 8 different combinations
 1798:     8.
 1799: 
 1800: 
 1801: receive_all_comb_nodeup_msgs(visible, Node) ->
 1802:     io:format("Receive nodeup visible...~n"),
 1803:     Exp = [{nodeup, Node},
 1804: 	   {nodeup, Node, []}]
 1805: 	++ mk_exp_mn_all_comb_nodeup_msgs_common(visible, Node),
 1806:     receive_mn_msgs(Exp),
 1807:     io:format("ok~n"),
 1808:     ok;
 1809: receive_all_comb_nodeup_msgs(hidden, Node) ->
 1810:     io:format("Receive nodeup hidden...~n"),
 1811:     Exp = mk_exp_mn_all_comb_nodeup_msgs_common(hidden, Node),
 1812:     receive_mn_msgs(Exp),
 1813:     io:format("ok~n"),
 1814:     ok.
 1815: 
 1816: mk_exp_mn_all_comb_nodeup_msgs_common(Type, Node) ->
 1817:     InfoNt = [{node_type, Type}],
 1818:     [{nodeup, Node, InfoNt},
 1819:      {nodeup, Node, InfoNt},
 1820:      {nodeup, Node, InfoNt},
 1821:      {nodeup, Node, InfoNt}].
 1822: 
 1823: receive_all_comb_nodedown_msgs(visible, Node, Reason) ->
 1824:     io:format("Receive nodedown visible...~n"),
 1825:     Exp = [{nodedown, Node},
 1826: 	   {nodedown, Node, [{nodedown_reason, Reason}]}]
 1827: 	++ mk_exp_mn_all_comb_nodedown_msgs_common(visible,
 1828: 						   Node,
 1829: 						   Reason),
 1830:     receive_mn_msgs(Exp),
 1831:     io:format("ok~n"),
 1832:     ok;
 1833: receive_all_comb_nodedown_msgs(hidden, Node, Reason) ->
 1834:     io:format("Receive nodedown hidden...~n"),
 1835:     Exp = mk_exp_mn_all_comb_nodedown_msgs_common(hidden, Node, Reason),
 1836:     receive_mn_msgs(Exp),
 1837:     io:format("ok~n"),
 1838:     ok.
 1839: 
 1840: mk_exp_mn_all_comb_nodedown_msgs_common(Type, Node, Reason) ->
 1841:     InfoNt = [{node_type, Type}],
 1842:     InfoNdrNt = lists:sort([{nodedown_reason, Reason}]++InfoNt),
 1843:     [{nodedown, Node, InfoNt},
 1844:      {nodedown, Node, InfoNt},
 1845:      {nodedown, Node, InfoNdrNt},
 1846:      {nodedown, Node, InfoNdrNt}].
 1847: 
 1848: receive_mn_msgs([]) ->
 1849:     ok;
 1850: receive_mn_msgs(Msgs) ->
 1851:     io:format("Expecting msgs: ~p~n", [Msgs]),
 1852:     receive
 1853: 	{_Dir, _Node} = Msg ->
 1854: 	    io:format("received ~p~n", [Msg]),
 1855: 	    case lists:member(Msg, Msgs) of
 1856: 		true -> receive_mn_msgs(lists:delete(Msg, Msgs));
 1857: 		false -> ct:fail({unexpected_message, Msg,
 1858: 				  expected_messages, Msgs})
 1859: 	    end;
 1860: 	{Dir, Node, Info} ->
 1861: 	    Msg = {Dir, Node, lists:sort(Info)},
 1862: 	    io:format("received ~p~n", [Msg]),
 1863: 	    case lists:member(Msg, Msgs) of
 1864: 		true -> receive_mn_msgs(lists:delete(Msg, Msgs));
 1865: 		false -> ct:fail({unexpected_message, Msg,
 1866: 				  expected_messages, Msgs})
 1867: 	    end;
 1868: 	Msg ->
 1869: 	    io:format("received ~p~n", [Msg]),
 1870: 	    ct:fail({unexpected_message, Msg,
 1871: 		     expected_messages, Msgs})
 1872:     end.
 1873: 
 1874: monitor_nodes_cleanup(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1875:     MonNodeState = monitor_node_state(),
 1876:     Me = self(),
 1877:     No = monitor_nodes_all_comb(true),
 1878:     Inf = spawn(fun () ->
 1879: 			monitor_nodes_all_comb(true),
 1880: 			Me ! {mons_set, self()},
 1881: 			receive after infinity -> ok end
 1882: 		end),
 1883:     TO = spawn(fun () ->
 1884: 		       monitor_nodes_all_comb(true),
 1885: 		       Me ! {mons_set, self()},
 1886: 		       receive after 500 -> ok end
 1887: 	       end),
 1888:     receive {mons_set, Inf} -> ok end,
 1889:     receive {mons_set, TO} -> ok end,
 1890:     MNLen = length(MonNodeState) + No*3,
 1891:     MNLen = length(monitor_node_state()),
 1892:     MonInf = erlang:monitor(process, Inf),
 1893:     MonTO = erlang:monitor(process, TO),
 1894:     exit(Inf, bang),
 1895:     No = monitor_nodes_all_comb(false),
 1896:     receive {'DOWN', MonInf, process, Inf, bang} -> ok end,
 1897:     receive {'DOWN', MonTO, process, TO, normal} -> ok end,
 1898:     MonNodeState = monitor_node_state(),
 1899:     no_msgs(),
 1900:     ok.
 1901: 
 1902: monitor_nodes_many(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1903:     run_dist_configs(fun monitor_nodes_many/2, Config).
 1904: 
 1905: monitor_nodes_many(DCfg, _Config) ->
 1906:     MonNodeState = monitor_node_state(),
 1907:     [Name] = get_nodenames(1, monitor_nodes_many),
 1908:     %% We want to perform more than 2^16 net_kernel:monitor_nodes
 1909:     %% since this will wrap an internal counter
 1910:     No = (1 bsl 16) + 17,
 1911:     repeat(fun () -> ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true) end, No),
 1912:     No = length(monitor_node_state()) - length(MonNodeState),
 1913:     {ok, Node} = start_node(DCfg, Name),
 1914:     repeat(fun () -> receive {nodeup, Node} -> ok end end, No),
 1915:     stop_node(Node),
 1916:     repeat(fun () -> receive {nodedown, Node} -> ok end end, No),
 1917:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(false),
 1918:     no_msgs(10),
 1919:     MonNodeState = monitor_node_state(),
 1920:     ok.
 1921: 
 1922: %% Test order of messages nodedown and nodeup.
 1923: monitor_nodes_down_up(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1924:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(#{connection => 0}),
 1925:     true = net_kernel:connect_node(Node),
 1926:     monitor_nodes_yoyo(Node),
 1927:     peer:stop(Peer).
 1928: 
 1929: monitor_nodes_yoyo(A) ->
 1930:     net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true),
 1931:     Papa = self(),
 1932: 
 1933:     %% Spawn lots of processes doing one erlang:monitor_node(A,true) each
 1934:     %% just to get lots of other monitors to fire when connection goes down
 1935:     %% and thereby give time for {nodeup,A} to race before {nodedown,A}.
 1936:     NodeMonCnt = 10000,
 1937:     NodeMons = [my_spawn_opt(fun F() ->
 1938:                                      monitor_node = receive_any(),
 1939:                                      monitor_node(A, true),
 1940:                                      Papa ! ready,
 1941:                                      {nodedown, A} =  receive_any(),
 1942:                                      F()
 1943:                              end,
 1944:                              [link, monitor, {priority, low}])
 1945:                 ||
 1946:                    _ <- lists:seq(1, NodeMonCnt)],
 1947: 
 1948:     %% Spawn message spamming process to trigger new connection setups
 1949:     %% as quick as possible.
 1950:     Spammer = my_spawn_opt(fun F() ->
 1951:                                    {dummy, A} ! trigger_auto_connect,
 1952:                                    F()
 1953:                            end,
 1954:                            [link, monitor]),
 1955: 
 1956:     %% Now bring connection down and verify we get {nodedown,A} before {nodeup,A}.
 1957:     Yoyos = 20,
 1958:     [begin
 1959:          [P ! monitor_node || P <- NodeMons],
 1960:          [receive ready -> ok end || _ <- NodeMons],
 1961: 
 1962:          Owner = get_conn_owner(A),
 1963:          exit(Owner, kill),
 1964: 
 1965:          {nodedown, A} = receive_any(),
 1966:          {nodeup, A} = receive_any()
 1967:      end
 1968:      || _ <- lists:seq(1,Yoyos)],
 1969: 
 1970:     unlink(Spammer),
 1971:     exit(Spammer, die),
 1972:     receive {'DOWN',_,process,Spammer,_} -> ok end,
 1973: 
 1974:     [begin unlink(P), exit(P, die) end || P <- NodeMons],
 1975:     [receive {'DOWN',_,process,P,_} -> ok end || P <- NodeMons],
 1976: 
 1977:     net_kernel:monitor_nodes(false),
 1978:     ok.
 1979: 
 1980: receive_any() ->
 1981:     receive_any(infinity).
 1982: 
 1983: receive_any(Timeout) ->
 1984:     receive
 1985:         M -> M
 1986:     after
 1987:         Timeout -> timeout
 1988:     end.
 1989: 
 1990: my_spawn_opt(Fun, Opts) ->
 1991:     case spawn_opt(Fun, Opts) of
 1992:         {Pid, _Mref} -> Pid;
 1993:         Pid -> Pid
 1994:     end.
 1995: 
 1996: get_conn_owner(Node) ->
 1997:     {ok, NodeInfo} = net_kernel:node_info(Node),
 1998:     {value,{owner, Owner}} = lists:keysearch(owner, 1, NodeInfo),
 1999:     Owner.
 2000: 
 2001: dist_ctrl_proc_smoke(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2002:     dist_ctrl_proc_test(get_nodenames(2, ?FUNCTION_NAME)).
 2003: 
 2004: dist_ctrl_proc_reject(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2005:     ToReject = combinations(dist_util:rejectable_flags()),
 2006:     lists:map(fun(Flags) ->
 2007:                       ct:log("Try to reject ~p",[Flags]),
 2008:                       dist_ctrl_proc_test(get_nodenames(2, ?FUNCTION_NAME),
 2009:                         "-gen_tcp_dist_reject_flags " ++ integer_to_list(Flags))
 2010:               end, ToReject).
 2011: 
 2012: combinations([H | T]) ->
 2013:     lists:flatten([[(1 bsl H) bor C || C <- combinations(T)] | combinations(T)]);
 2014: combinations([]) ->
 2015:     [0];
 2016: combinations(BitField) ->
 2017:     lists:sort(combinations(bits(BitField, 0))).
 2018: 
 2019: bits(0, _) ->
 2020:     [];
 2021: bits(BitField, Cnt) when BitField band 1 == 1 ->
 2022:     [Cnt | bits(BitField bsr 1, Cnt + 1)];
 2023: bits(BitField, Cnt) ->
 2024:     bits(BitField bsr 1, Cnt + 1).
 2025: 
 2026: dist_ctrl_proc_test(Nodes) ->
 2027:     dist_ctrl_proc_test(Nodes,"").
 2028: 
 2029: dist_ctrl_proc_test([Name1,Name2], Extra) ->
 2030:     ThisNode = node(),
 2031:     GenTcpOptProlog = "-proto_dist gen_tcp "
 2032:         "-gen_tcp_dist_output_loop " ++ atom_to_list(?MODULE) ++ " " ++
 2033:         "dist_cntrlr_output_test_size " ++ Extra,
 2034:     {ok, Node1} = start_node("", Name1, "-proto_dist gen_tcp"),
 2035:     {ok, Node2} = start_node("", Name2, GenTcpOptProlog),
 2036:     NL = lists:sort([ThisNode, Node1, Node2]),
 2037:     wait_until(fun () ->
 2038:                        NL == lists:sort([node()|nodes()])
 2039:                end),
 2040:     wait_until(fun () ->
 2041:                        NL == lists:sort([rpc:call(Node1,erlang, node, [])
 2042:                                          | rpc:call(Node1, erlang, nodes, [])])
 2043:                end),
 2044:     wait_until(fun () ->
 2045:                        NL == lists:sort([rpc:call(Node2,erlang, node, [])
 2046:                                          | rpc:call(Node2, erlang, nodes, [])])
 2047:                end),
 2048: 
 2049:     smoke_communicate(Node1, gen_tcp_dist, dist_cntrlr_output_loop),
 2050:     smoke_communicate(Node2, erl_distribution_SUITE, dist_cntrlr_output_loop_size),
 2051: 
 2052:     stop_node(Node1),
 2053:     stop_node(Node2),
 2054:     ok.
 2055: 
 2056: smoke_communicate(Node, OLoopMod, OLoopFun) ->
 2057:     %% Verify that we actually are executing the distribution
 2058:     %% module we expect and also massage message passing over
 2059:     %% the connection a bit...
 2060:     Ps = rpc:call(Node, erlang, processes, []),
 2061:     try
 2062:         lists:foreach(
 2063:           fun (P) ->
 2064:                   case rpc:call(Node, erlang, process_info, [P, current_stacktrace]) of
 2065:                       undefined ->
 2066:                           ok;
 2067:                       {current_stacktrace, StkTrace} ->
 2068:                           lists:foreach(fun ({Mod, Fun, 2, _}) when Mod == OLoopMod,
 2069:                                                                     Fun == OLoopFun ->
 2070:                                                 io:format("~p ~p~n", [P, StkTrace]),
 2071:                                                 throw(found_it);
 2072:                                             (_) ->
 2073:                                                 ok
 2074:                                         end, StkTrace)
 2075:                   end
 2076:           end, Ps),
 2077:         exit({missing, {OLoopMod, OLoopFun}})
 2078:     catch
 2079:         throw:found_it -> ok
 2080:     end,
 2081:     Bin = list_to_binary(lists:duplicate(1000,100)),
 2082:     BitStr = <<0:7999>>,
 2083:     List = [[Bin], atom, [BitStr|Bin], make_ref(), [[[BitStr|"hopp"]]],
 2084:             4711, 111122222211111111111111,"hej", fun () -> ok end, BitStr,
 2085:             self(), fun erlang:node/1],
 2086:     Pid = spawn_link(Node, fun () -> receive {From1, Msg1} -> From1 ! Msg1 end,
 2087:                                      receive {From2, Msg2} -> From2 ! Msg2 end
 2088:                            end),
 2089:     R = make_ref(),
 2090:     Pid ! {self(), [R, List]},
 2091:     receive [R, L1] -> List = L1 end,
 2092: 
 2093:     %% Send a huge message in order to trigger message fragmentation if enabled
 2094:     FragBin = <<0:(2*(1024*64*8))>>,
 2095:     Pid ! {self(), [R, List, FragBin]},
 2096:     receive [R, L2, B] -> List = L2, FragBin = B end,
 2097: 
 2098:     unlink(Pid),
 2099:     exit(Pid, kill),
 2100:     ok.
 2101: 
 2102: 
 2103: erl_uds_dist_smoke_test(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2104:     case os:type() of
 2105:         {win32,_} ->
 2106:             {skipped, "Not on Windows"};
 2107:         _ ->
 2108:             do_erl_uds_dist_smoke_test()
 2109:     end.
 2110: 
 2111: do_erl_uds_dist_smoke_test() ->
 2112:     [Node1, Node2] = lists:map(fun (Name) ->
 2113:                                        list_to_atom(atom_to_list(Name) ++ "@localhost")
 2114:                                end,
 2115:                                get_nodenames(2, erl_uds_dist_smoke_test)),
 2116:     {LPort, Acceptor} = uds_listen(),
 2117:     start_uds_node(Node1, LPort),
 2118:     start_uds_node(Node2, LPort),
 2119:     receive
 2120:         {uds_nodeup, N1} ->
 2121:             io:format("~p is up~n", [N1])
 2122:     end,
 2123:     receive
 2124:         {uds_nodeup, N2} ->
 2125:             io:format("~p is up~n", [N2])
 2126:     end,
 2127:     
 2128:     io:format("Testing ping net_adm:ping(~p) on ~p~n", [Node2, Node1]),
 2129:     Node1 ! {self(), {net_adm, ping, [Node2]}},
 2130:     receive
 2131:         {Node1, PingRes} ->
 2132:             io:format("~p~n", [PingRes]),
 2133:             pong = PingRes
 2134:     end,
 2135: 
 2136:     io:format("Testing nodes() on ~p~n", [Node1]),
 2137:     Node1 ! {self(), {erlang, nodes, []}},
 2138:     receive
 2139:         {Node1, N1List} ->
 2140:             io:format("~p~n", [N1List]),
 2141:             [Node2] = N1List
 2142:     end,
 2143: 
 2144:     io:format("Testing nodes() on ~p~n", [Node2]),
 2145:     Node2 ! {self(), {erlang, nodes, []}},
 2146:     receive
 2147:         {Node2, N2List} ->
 2148:             io:format("~p~n", [N2List]),
 2149:             [Node1] = N2List
 2150:     end,
 2151: 
 2152:     io:format("Shutting down~n", []),
 2153: 
 2154:     Node1 ! {self(), close},
 2155:     Node2 ! {self(), close},
 2156: 
 2157:     receive {Node1, C1} -> ok = C1 end,
 2158:     receive {Node2, C2} -> ok = C2 end,
 2159: 
 2160:     unlink(Acceptor),
 2161:     exit(Acceptor, kill),
 2162: 
 2163:     io:format("ok~n", []),
 2164: 
 2165:     ok.
 2166: 
 2167: %% Helpers for testing the erl_uds_dist example
 2168: 
 2169: uds_listen() ->
 2170:     Me = self(),
 2171:     {ok, LSock} = gen_tcp:listen(0, [binary, {packet, 4}, {active, false}]),
 2172:     {ok, LPort} = inet:port(LSock),
 2173:     {LPort, spawn_link(fun () ->
 2174:                                uds_accept_loop(LSock, Me)
 2175:                        end)}.
 2176: 
 2177: uds_accept_loop(LSock, TestProc) ->
 2178:     {ok, Sock} = gen_tcp:accept(LSock),
 2179:     _ = spawn_link(fun () ->
 2180:                            uds_rpc_client_init(Sock, TestProc)
 2181:                    end),
 2182:     uds_accept_loop(LSock, TestProc).
 2183: 
 2184: uds_rpc(Sock, MFA) ->
 2185:     ok = gen_tcp:send(Sock, term_to_binary(MFA)),
 2186:     case gen_tcp:recv(Sock, 0) of
 2187:         {error, Reason} ->
 2188:             error({recv_failed, Reason});
 2189:         {ok, Packet} ->
 2190:             binary_to_term(Packet)
 2191:     end.
 2192: 
 2193: uds_rpc_client_init(Sock, TestProc) ->
 2194:     case uds_rpc(Sock, {erlang, node, []}) of
 2195:         nonode@nohost ->
 2196:             %% Wait for distribution to come up...
 2197:             receive after 100 -> ok end,
 2198:             uds_rpc_client_init(Sock, TestProc);
 2199:         Node when is_atom(Node) ->
 2200:             register(Node, self()),
 2201:             TestProc ! {uds_nodeup, Node},
 2202:             uds_rpc_client_loop(Sock, Node)
 2203:     end.
 2204: 
 2205: uds_rpc_client_loop(Sock, Node) ->
 2206:     receive
 2207:         {From, close} ->
 2208:             ok = gen_tcp:send(Sock, term_to_binary(close)),
 2209:             From ! {Node, gen_tcp:close(Sock)},
 2210:             exit(normal);
 2211:         {From, ApplyData} ->
 2212:             From ! {Node, uds_rpc(Sock, ApplyData)},
 2213:             uds_rpc_client_loop(Sock, Node)
 2214:     end.
 2215: 
 2216: uds_rpc_server_loop(Sock) ->
 2217:     case gen_tcp:recv(Sock, 0) of
 2218:         {error, Reason} ->
 2219:             error({recv_failed, Reason});
 2220:         {ok, Packet} ->
 2221:             case binary_to_term(Packet) of
 2222:                 {M, F, A} when is_atom(M), is_atom(F), is_list(A) ->
 2223:                     ok = gen_tcp:send(Sock, term_to_binary(apply(M, F, A)));
 2224:                 {F, A} when is_function(F), is_list(A) ->
 2225:                     ok = gen_tcp:send(Sock, term_to_binary(apply(F, A)));
 2226:                 close ->
 2227:                     ok = gen_tcp:close(Sock),
 2228:                     exit(normal);
 2229:                 Other ->
 2230:                     error({unexpected_data, Other})
 2231:             end
 2232:     end,
 2233:     uds_rpc_server_loop(Sock).
 2234: 
 2235: start_uds_rpc_server([PortString]) ->
 2236:     Port = list_to_integer(PortString),
 2237:     {Pid, Mon} = spawn_monitor(fun () ->
 2238:                                        {ok, Sock} = gen_tcp:connect({127,0,0,1}, Port,
 2239:                                                                     [binary, {packet, 4},
 2240:                                                                      {active, false}]),
 2241:                                        uds_rpc_server_loop(Sock)
 2242:                                end),
 2243:     receive
 2244:         {'DOWN', Mon, process, Pid, Reason} ->
 2245:             if Reason == normal ->
 2246:                     halt();
 2247:                true ->
 2248:                     EStr = lists:flatten(io_lib:format("uds rpc server crashed: ~p", [Reason])),
 2249:                     (catch file:write_file("uds_rpc_server_crash."++os:getpid(), EStr)),
 2250:                     halt(EStr)
 2251:             end
 2252:     end.
 2253: 
 2254: start_uds_node(NodeName, LPort) ->
 2255:     Static = "-detached -noinput -proto_dist erl_uds",
 2256:     Pa = filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
 2257:     Prog = case catch init:get_argument(progname) of
 2258: 	       {ok,[[P]]} -> P;
 2259: 	       _ -> error(no_progname_argument_found)
 2260: 	   end,
 2261:     {ok, Pwd} = file:get_cwd(),
 2262:     NameStr = atom_to_list(NodeName),
 2263:     CmdLine = Prog ++ " "
 2264: 	++ Static
 2265: 	++ " -sname " ++ NameStr
 2266: 	++ " -pa " ++ Pa
 2267: 	++ " -env ERL_CRASH_DUMP " ++ Pwd ++ "/erl_crash_dump." ++ NameStr
 2268: 	++ " -setcookie " ++ atom_to_list(erlang:get_cookie())
 2269:         ++ " -run " ++ atom_to_list(?MODULE) ++ " start_uds_rpc_server "
 2270:         ++ integer_to_list(LPort),
 2271:     io:format("Starting: ~p~n", [CmdLine]),
 2272:     case open_port({spawn, CmdLine}, []) of
 2273: 	Port when is_port(Port) ->
 2274: 	    unlink(Port),
 2275: 	    erlang:port_close(Port);
 2276: 	Error ->
 2277: 	    error({open_port_failed, Error})
 2278:     end,
 2279:     ok.
 2280: 
 2281: erl_1424(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2282:     {error, Reason} = erl_epmd:names("."),
 2283:     {comment, lists:flatten(io_lib:format("Reason: ~p", [Reason]))}.
 2284: 
 2285: net_kernel_start(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2286:     MyName = net_kernel_start_tester,
 2287:     register(MyName, self()),
 2288:     net_kernel_start_test(MyName, 120, 8, true, false),
 2289:     net_kernel_start_test(MyName, 120, 8, false, false),
 2290:     net_kernel_start_test(MyName, 120, 8, true, true),
 2291:     net_kernel_start_test(MyName, undefined, undefined, undefined, undefined).
 2292: 
 2293: net_kernel_start_test(MyName, NetTickTime, NetTickIntesity, DistListen, Hidden) ->
 2294:     TestNameStr = "net_kernel_start_test_node-"
 2295:         ++ integer_to_list(erlang:system_time(seconds))
 2296:         ++ "-" ++ integer_to_list(erlang:unique_integer([monotonic,positive])),
 2297:     TestNode = list_to_atom(TestNameStr ++ "@" ++ atom_to_list(gethostname())),
 2298:     CmdLine = net_kernel_start_cmdline(MyName, list_to_atom(TestNameStr),
 2299:                                        NetTickTime, NetTickIntesity, DistListen, Hidden),
 2300:     io:format("Starting test node ~p: ~s~n", [TestNode, CmdLine]),
 2301:     case open_port({spawn, CmdLine}, []) of
 2302: 	Port when is_port(Port) ->
 2303:             case DistListen == false of
 2304:                 false ->
 2305:                     ok;
 2306:                 true ->
 2307:                     receive after 1500 -> ok end,
 2308:                     pang = net_adm:ping(TestNode),
 2309:                     ok
 2310:             end,
 2311:             receive
 2312:                 {i_am_alive, Pid, Node, NTT} = Msg ->
 2313:                     IsHidden = lists:member(TestNode, nodes(hidden)),
 2314:                     IsVisible = lists:member(TestNode, nodes(visible)),
 2315:                     io:format("IsVisible = ~p~nIsHidden = ~p~n", [IsVisible, IsHidden]),
 2316:                     io:format("Response from ~p: ~p~n", [Node, Msg]),
 2317:                     rpc:cast(Node, erlang, halt, []),
 2318:                     catch erlang:port_close(Port),
 2319:                     TestNode = node(Pid),
 2320:                     TestNode = Node,
 2321:                     case NetTickTime == undefined of
 2322:                         true ->
 2323:                             {ok, DefNTT} = application:get_env(kernel, net_ticktime),
 2324:                             DefNTT = NTT;
 2325:                         false ->
 2326:                             NetTickTime = NTT
 2327:                     end,
 2328:                     case DistListen == false orelse Hidden == true of
 2329:                         true ->
 2330:                             true = IsHidden,
 2331:                             false = IsVisible;
 2332:                         false ->
 2333:                             false = IsHidden,
 2334:                             true = IsVisible
 2335:                     end
 2336:             end,
 2337:             ok;
 2338: 	Error ->
 2339: 	    error({open_port_failed, TestNode, Error})
 2340:     end.
 2341: 
 2342: net_kernel_start_cmdline(TestName, Name, NetTickTime, NetTickIntensity, DistListen, Hidden) ->
 2343:     Pa = filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
 2344:     Prog = case catch init:get_argument(progname) of
 2345: 	       {ok, [[Prg]]} -> Prg;
 2346: 	       _ -> error(missing_progname)
 2347: 	   end,
 2348:     NameDomain = case net_kernel:longnames() of
 2349:                      false -> "shortnames";
 2350:                      true -> "longnames"
 2351:                  end,
 2352:     {ok, Pwd} = file:get_cwd(),
 2353:     NameStr = atom_to_list(Name),
 2354:     Prog ++ " -noinput -noshell -detached -pa " ++ Pa
 2355: 	++ " -env ERL_CRASH_DUMP " ++ Pwd ++ "/erl_crash_dump." ++ NameStr
 2356: 	++ " -setcookie " ++ atom_to_list(erlang:get_cookie())
 2357: 	++ " -run " ++ atom_to_list(?MODULE) ++ " net_kernel_start_do_test "
 2358: 	++ atom_to_list(TestName) ++ " " ++ atom_to_list(node()) ++ " "
 2359:         ++ NameStr ++ " " ++ NameDomain
 2360:         ++ case NetTickTime == undefined of
 2361:                true ->
 2362:                    "";
 2363:                false ->
 2364:                    " " ++ integer_to_list(NetTickTime) ++
 2365:                        " " ++ integer_to_list(NetTickIntensity)
 2366:            end
 2367:         ++ case DistListen == undefined of
 2368:                true -> "";
 2369:                false -> " " ++ atom_to_list(DistListen)
 2370:            end
 2371:         ++ case Hidden == undefined of
 2372:                true -> "";
 2373:                false -> " " ++ atom_to_list(Hidden)
 2374:            end.
 2375: 
 2376: net_kernel_start_do_test([TestName, TestNode, Name, NameDomain]) ->
 2377:     net_kernel_start_do_test(TestName, TestNode, list_to_atom(Name),
 2378:                              #{name_domain => list_to_atom(NameDomain)});
 2379: 
 2380: net_kernel_start_do_test([TestName, TestNode, Name, NameDomain, NetTickTime, NetTickIntensity,
 2381:                           DistListen, Hidden]) ->
 2382:     net_kernel_start_do_test(TestName, TestNode, list_to_atom(Name),
 2383:                              #{net_ticktime => list_to_integer(NetTickTime),
 2384:                                name_domain => list_to_atom(NameDomain),
 2385:                                net_tickintensity => list_to_integer(NetTickIntensity),
 2386:                                dist_listen => list_to_atom(DistListen),
 2387:                                hidden => list_to_atom(Hidden)}).
 2388: 
 2389: net_kernel_start_do_test(TestName, TestNode, Name, Options) ->
 2390:     case net_kernel:start(Name, Options) of
 2391:         {ok, _Pid} ->
 2392:             case maps:get(dist_listen, Options, true) of
 2393:                 false -> receive after 3000 -> ok end;
 2394:                 true -> ok
 2395:             end,
 2396:             Tester = {list_to_atom(TestName), list_to_atom(TestNode)},
 2397:             Tester ! {i_am_alive, self(), node(), net_kernel:get_net_ticktime()},
 2398:             receive after 60000 -> ok end,
 2399:             erlang:halt();
 2400:         Error ->
 2401:             erlang:halt(lists:flatten(io_lib:format("~p", [Error])))
 2402:     end.
 2403: 
 2404: differing_cookies(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2405:     test_server:timetrap({minutes, 1}),
 2406:     Node = node(),
 2407:     true = Node =/= nonode@nohost,
 2408:     [] = nodes(),
 2409:     BaseName = atom_to_list(?FUNCTION_NAME),
 2410: 
 2411:     %% Use -hidden nodes to avoid global connecting all nodes
 2412: 
 2413:     %% Start node A with different cookie
 2414:     NodeAName = BaseName++"_nodeA",
 2415:     NodeA = full_node_name(NodeAName),
 2416:     NodeACookieL = BaseName++"_cookieA",
 2417:     NodeACookie = list_to_atom(NodeACookieL),
 2418:     true = erlang:set_cookie( NodeA, NodeACookie ),
 2419:     { ok, NodeA } =
 2420:         start_node( "-hidden", NodeAName, "-setcookie "++NodeACookieL ),
 2421:     try
 2422: 
 2423:         %% Verify the cluster
 2424:         [ NodeA ] = nodes(hidden),
 2425:         [ Node ] = rpc:call( NodeA, erlang, nodes, [hidden] ),
 2426: 
 2427:         %% Start node B with another different cookie
 2428:         NodeBName = BaseName++"_nodeB",
 2429:         NodeB = full_node_name(NodeBName),
 2430:         NodeBCookieL = BaseName++"_cookieB",
 2431:         NodeBCookie = list_to_atom(NodeBCookieL),
 2432:         true = erlang:set_cookie( NodeB, NodeBCookie ),
 2433:         { ok, NodeB } =
 2434:             start_node( "-hidden", NodeBName, "-setcookie "++NodeBCookieL ),
 2435:         try
 2436: 
 2437:             %% Verify the cluster
 2438:             equal_sets( [NodeA, NodeB], nodes(hidden) ),
 2439:             [ Node ] = rpc:call( NodeA, erlang, nodes, [hidden] ),
 2440:             [ Node ] = rpc:call( NodeB, erlang, nodes, [hidden] ),
 2441: 
 2442:             %% Verify that the nodes can not connect
 2443:             %% before correcting the cookie configuration
 2444:             pang = rpc:call( NodeA, net_adm, ping, [NodeB] ),
 2445:             pang = rpc:call( NodeB, net_adm, ping, [NodeA] ),
 2446: 
 2447:             %% Configure cookie and connect node A -> B
 2448:             true = rpc:call( NodeA, erlang, set_cookie, [NodeB, NodeBCookie] ),
 2449:             pong = rpc:call( NodeA, net_adm, ping, [NodeB] ),
 2450: 
 2451:             %% Verify the cluster
 2452:             NodeACookie = rpc:call( NodeA, erlang, get_cookie, []),
 2453:             NodeBCookie = rpc:call( NodeB, erlang, get_cookie, []),
 2454:             equal_sets( [NodeA, NodeB], nodes(hidden) ),
 2455:             equal_sets( [Node, NodeB],
 2456:                         rpc:call( NodeA, erlang, nodes, [hidden] )),
 2457:             equal_sets( [Node, NodeA],
 2458:                         rpc:call( NodeB, erlang, nodes, [hidden] )),
 2459: 
 2460:             %% Disconnect node A from B
 2461:             true = rpc:call( NodeB, net_kernel, disconnect, [NodeA] ),
 2462: 
 2463:             %% Verify the cluster
 2464:             equal_sets( [NodeA, NodeB], nodes(hidden) ),
 2465:             [ Node ] = rpc:call( NodeA, erlang, nodes, [hidden] ),
 2466:             [ Node ] = rpc:call( NodeB, erlang, nodes, [hidden] ),
 2467: 
 2468:             %% Reconnect, now node B -> A
 2469:             pong = rpc:call( NodeB, net_adm, ping, [NodeA] ),
 2470: 
 2471:             %% Verify the cluster
 2472:             equal_sets( [NodeA, NodeB], nodes(hidden) ),
 2473:             equal_sets( [Node, NodeB],
 2474:                         rpc:call( NodeA, erlang, nodes, [hidden] )),
 2475:             equal_sets( [Node, NodeA],
 2476:                         rpc:call( NodeB, erlang, nodes, [hidden] ))
 2477: 
 2478:         after
 2479:             _ = stop_node(NodeB)
 2480:         end
 2481:     after
 2482:         _ = stop_node(NodeA)
 2483:     end,
 2484:     [] = nodes(hidden),
 2485:     ok.
 2486: 
 2487: cmdline_setcookie_2(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2488:     test_server:timetrap({minutes, 1}),
 2489:     Node = node(),
 2490:     true = Node =/= nonode@nohost,
 2491:     [] = nodes(),
 2492:     NodeL = atom_to_list(Node),
 2493:     BaseName = atom_to_list(?FUNCTION_NAME),
 2494:     NodeCookie = erlang:get_cookie(),
 2495:     NodeCookieL = atom_to_list(NodeCookie),
 2496: 
 2497:     %% Use -hidden nodes to avoid global connecting all nodes
 2498: 
 2499:     %% Start node A with different cookie
 2500:     %% and cookie configuration of mother node
 2501:     NodeAName = BaseName++"_nodeA",
 2502:     NodeA = full_node_name(NodeAName),
 2503:     NodeACookieL = BaseName++"_cookieA",
 2504:     NodeACookie = list_to_atom(NodeACookieL),
 2505:     { ok, NodeA } =
 2506:         start_node(
 2507:           "-hidden", NodeAName,
 2508:           "-setcookie "++NodeL++" "++NodeCookieL ),
 2509: 
 2510:     try
 2511: 
 2512:         %% Verify the cluster
 2513:         [ NodeA ] = nodes(hidden),
 2514:         [ Node ] = rpc:call( NodeA, erlang, nodes, [hidden] ),
 2515:         NodeCookie = rpc:call( NodeA, erlang, get_cookie, []),
 2516: 
 2517:         true = rpc:call( NodeA, erlang, set_cookie, [NodeACookie] ),
 2518: 
 2519:         %% Start node B with different cookie
 2520:         %% and cookie configuration of mother node and node A
 2521:         NodeBName = BaseName++"_nodeB",
 2522:         NodeB = full_node_name(NodeBName),
 2523:         NodeBCookieL = BaseName++"_cookieB",
 2524:         NodeBCookie = list_to_atom(NodeBCookieL),
 2525:         { ok, NodeB } =
 2526:             start_node(
 2527:               "-hidden", NodeBName,
 2528:               "-setcookie "++NodeBCookieL++" "
 2529:               "-setcookie "++NodeL++" "++NodeCookieL++" "
 2530:               "-setcookie "++atom_to_list(NodeA)++" "++NodeACookieL ),
 2531: 
 2532:         try
 2533: 
 2534:             %% Verify the cluster
 2535:             NodeACookie = rpc:call( NodeA, erlang, get_cookie, []),
 2536:             NodeBCookie = rpc:call( NodeB, erlang, get_cookie, []),
 2537:             equal_sets( [NodeA, NodeB], nodes(hidden) ),
 2538:             [ Node ] = rpc:call( NodeA, erlang, nodes, [hidden] ),
 2539:             [ Node ] = rpc:call( NodeB, erlang, nodes, [hidden] ),
 2540: 
 2541:             %% Connect the nodes
 2542:             pong = rpc:call( NodeA, net_adm, ping, [NodeB] ),
 2543: 
 2544:             %% Verify the cluster
 2545:             NodeACookie = rpc:call( NodeA, erlang, get_cookie, []),
 2546:             NodeBCookie = rpc:call( NodeB, erlang, get_cookie, []),
 2547:             equal_sets( [NodeA, NodeB], nodes(hidden) ),
 2548:             equal_sets( [Node, NodeB],
 2549:                         rpc:call( NodeA, erlang, nodes, [hidden] )),
 2550:             equal_sets( [Node, NodeA],
 2551:                         rpc:call( NodeB, erlang, nodes, [hidden] ))
 2552: 
 2553:         after
 2554:             _ = stop_node(NodeB)
 2555:         end
 2556:     after
 2557:         _ = stop_node(NodeA)
 2558:     end,
 2559:     [] = nodes(hidden),
 2560:     ok.
 2561: 
 2562: connection_cookie(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2563:     test_server:timetrap({minutes, 1}),
 2564:     Node = node(),
 2565:     true = Node =/= nonode@nohost,
 2566:     [] = nodes(),
 2567:     NodeL = atom_to_list(Node),
 2568:     BaseName = atom_to_list(?FUNCTION_NAME),
 2569: 
 2570:     %% Start node A with dedicated connection cookie
 2571:     NodeAName = BaseName++"_nodeA",
 2572:     NodeA = full_node_name(NodeAName),
 2573:     NodeACookieL = BaseName++"_cookieA",
 2574:     NodeACookie = list_to_atom(NodeACookieL),
 2575:     true = NodeACookie =/= erlang:get_cookie(),
 2576:     ConnectionCookieL = BaseName++"_connectionCookie",
 2577:     ConnectionCookie = list_to_atom(ConnectionCookieL),
 2578:     true = erlang:set_cookie( NodeA, ConnectionCookie ),
 2579:     { ok, NodeA } =
 2580:         start_node(
 2581:           "", NodeAName,
 2582:           "-setcookie "++NodeACookieL++" "
 2583:           "-setcookie "++NodeL++" "++ConnectionCookieL ),
 2584: 
 2585:     try
 2586: 
 2587:         %% Verify the cluster
 2588:         [ NodeA ] = nodes(),
 2589:         [ Node ] = rpc:call( NodeA, erlang, nodes, [] ),
 2590:         NodeACookie = rpc:call( NodeA, erlang, get_cookie, []),
 2591:         ConnectionCookie = rpc:call( NodeA, auth, get_cookie, [Node]),
 2592:         ConnectionCookie = erlang:get_cookie( NodeA )
 2593: 
 2594:     after
 2595:         _ = stop_node(NodeA)
 2596:     end,
 2597:     [] = nodes(),
 2598:     ok.
 2599: 
 2600: dyn_differing_cookies(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2601:     test_server:timetrap({minutes, 1}),
 2602:     MotherNode = node(),
 2603:     true = MotherNode =/= nonode@nohost,
 2604:     [] = nodes(hidden),
 2605:     MotherNodeL = atom_to_list(MotherNode),
 2606:     BaseName = atom_to_list(?FUNCTION_NAME),
 2607:     MotherNodeCookie = erlang:get_cookie(),
 2608:     MotherNodeCookieL = atom_to_list(MotherNodeCookie),
 2609:     register(?FUNCTION_NAME, self()),
 2610: 
 2611:     %% Start node A with different cookie
 2612:     %% and cookie configuration of mother node
 2613:     DynNodeCookieL = BaseName++"_cookieA",
 2614:     DynNodeCookie = list_to_atom(DynNodeCookieL),
 2615:     {_NF1, Port1} =
 2616:         start_node_unconnected(
 2617:           "-setcookie "++MotherNodeL++" "++MotherNodeCookieL,
 2618:           undefined, DynNodeCookie,
 2619:           ?MODULE, run_remote_test,
 2620:           ["ddc_remote_run", MotherNodeL, "cmdline", MotherNodeCookieL] ),
 2621: 
 2622:     dyn_differing_cookies(MotherNode, MotherNodeCookie, DynNodeCookie, Port1),
 2623: 
 2624:     %% Same again, but use erlang:set_cookie/2 to set MotherNodeCookie
 2625:     {_NF2, Port2} =
 2626:         start_node_unconnected(
 2627:           "",
 2628:           undefined, DynNodeCookie,
 2629:           ?MODULE, run_remote_test,
 2630:           ["ddc_remote_run", MotherNodeL, "set_cookie", MotherNodeCookieL] ),
 2631: 
 2632:     dyn_differing_cookies(MotherNode, MotherNodeCookie, DynNodeCookie, Port2).
 2633: 
 2634: 
 2635: dyn_differing_cookies(MotherNode, MotherNodeCookie, DynNodeCookie, Port) ->
 2636:     receive
 2637:         { MotherNode, MotherNodeCookie, DynNodeCookie, DynNode } ->
 2638:             [ DynNode ] = nodes(hidden),
 2639:             [ MotherNode ] = rpc:call( DynNode, erlang, nodes, [hidden] ),
 2640:             DynNodeCookie = rpc:call( DynNode, erlang, get_cookie, [] ),
 2641:             MotherNodeCookie =
 2642:                 rpc:call( DynNode, erlang, get_cookie, [MotherNode] ),
 2643:             {ddc_remote_run, DynNode} !
 2644:                 {MotherNode, MotherNodeCookie, DynNode},
 2645: 
 2646:             0 = wait_for_port_exit(Port),
 2647: 
 2648:             [] = nodes(hidden),
 2649:             ok;
 2650:         {Port, {data, Data}} ->
 2651:             io:format("~p: ~s", [Port, Data]),
 2652:             dyn_differing_cookies(
 2653:               MotherNode, MotherNodeCookie, DynNodeCookie, Port);
 2654:         Other ->
 2655:             error({unexpected, Other})
 2656:     end.
 2657: 
 2658: ddc_remote_run(MotherNode, [SetCookie, MotherNodeCookieL]) ->
 2659:     nonode@nohost = node(),
 2660:     [] = nodes(hidden),
 2661:     MotherNodeCookie = list_to_atom(MotherNodeCookieL),
 2662:     case SetCookie of
 2663:         "set_cookie" ->
 2664:             erlang:set_cookie(MotherNode, MotherNodeCookie);
 2665:         "cmdline" ->
 2666:             ok
 2667:     end,
 2668:     MotherNodeCookie = erlang:get_cookie(MotherNode),
 2669:     true = net_kernel:connect_node( MotherNode ),
 2670:     [ MotherNode ] = nodes(hidden),
 2671:     DynNode = node(),
 2672:     [ DynNode ] = rpc:call( MotherNode, erlang, nodes, [hidden] ),
 2673:     MotherNodeCookie = erlang:get_cookie( MotherNode ),
 2674:     MotherNodeCookie = rpc:call( MotherNode, erlang, get_cookie, [] ),
 2675:     %% Here we get the mother node's default cookie
 2676:     MotherNodeCookie = rpc:call( MotherNode, erlang, get_cookie, [DynNode] ),
 2677:     DynNodeCookie = erlang:get_cookie(),
 2678:     register(ddc_remote_run, self() ),
 2679:     {dyn_differing_cookies, MotherNode} !
 2680:         {MotherNode, MotherNodeCookie, DynNodeCookie, DynNode},
 2681:     receive
 2682:         { MotherNode, MotherNodeCookie, DynNode } ->
 2683:             true = disconnect_node( MotherNode ),
 2684:             [] = nodes(hidden),
 2685:             ok;
 2686:         Other ->
 2687:             error({unexpected, Other})
 2688:     end.
 2689: 
 2690: xdg_cookie(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2691:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 2692: 
 2693:     TestHome = filename:join(PrivDir, ?FUNCTION_NAME),
 2694:     ok = file:make_dir(TestHome),
 2695: 
 2696:     HomeEnv = case os:type() of
 2697:               {win32, _} ->
 2698:                   [Drive | Path] = filename:split(TestHome),
 2699:                   [{"APPDATA", filename:join(TestHome,"AppData")},
 2700:                    {"HOMEDRIVE", Drive}, {"HOMEPATH", filename:join(Path)}];
 2701:               _ ->
 2702:                   [{"HOME", TestHome}]
 2703:           end,
 2704: 
 2705:     NodeOpts = #{ env => HomeEnv ++
 2706:                       [{"ERL_CRASH_DUMP", filename:join([TestHome,"erl_crash.dump"])}],
 2707:                   connection => 0 },
 2708: 
 2709:     %% Test that a default .erlang.cookie file is created
 2710:     {ok, CreatorPeer, _} = peer:start_link(NodeOpts#{ name => peer:random_name(?FUNCTION_NAME) }),
 2711:     UserConfig = peer:call(CreatorPeer, filename, basedir, [user_config,"erlang"]),
 2712:     ?assert(peer:call(CreatorPeer, filelib, is_regular,
 2713:                       [filename:join(TestHome, ".erlang.cookie")])),
 2714:     OrigCookie = peer:call(CreatorPeer, erlang, get_cookie, []),
 2715:     peer:stop(CreatorPeer),
 2716: 
 2717:     %% Test that the $HOME/.erlang.cookie file takes precedence over XDG
 2718:     XDGCookie = filename:join([UserConfig, ".erlang.cookie"]),
 2719:     ok = filelib:ensure_dir(XDGCookie),
 2720:     ok = file:write_file(XDGCookie, "Me want cookie!"),
 2721:     {ok, XDGFI} = file:read_file_info(XDGCookie),
 2722:     ok = file:write_file_info(XDGCookie, XDGFI#file_info{ mode = 8#600 }),
 2723: 
 2724:     {ok, Peer, _} = peer:start_link(NodeOpts#{ name => peer:random_name(?FUNCTION_NAME) }),
 2725: 
 2726:     ?assertEqual(OrigCookie, peer:call(Peer, erlang, get_cookie, [])),
 2727: 
 2728:     peer:stop(Peer),
 2729: 
 2730:     %% Check that XDG cookie works after we delete the $HOME cookie
 2731:     HomeCookie = filename:join(TestHome, ".erlang.cookie"),
 2732:     {ok, HomeFI} = file:read_file_info(HomeCookie),
 2733:     ok = file:write_file_info(HomeCookie, HomeFI#file_info{ mode = 8#777 }),
 2734:     ok = file:delete(HomeCookie),
 2735:     {ok, Peer2, _} = peer:start_link(NodeOpts#{ name => peer:random_name(?FUNCTION_NAME) }),
 2736:     ?assertEqual('Me want cookie!', peer:call(Peer2, erlang, get_cookie, [])),
 2737: 
 2738:     peer:stop(Peer2),
 2739: 
 2740:     ok.
 2741: 
 2742: allowed(_Config) ->
 2743:     %% inspired by differing_cookies/1
 2744:     test_server:timetrap({minutes, 1}),
 2745:     Node = node(),
 2746:     true = Node =/= nonode@nohost,
 2747:     [] = nodes(),
 2748:     BaseName = atom_to_list(?FUNCTION_NAME),
 2749: 
 2750:     %% Use -hidden nodes to avoid global connecting all nodes
 2751: 
 2752:     %% Start node A with different cookie
 2753:     NodeAName = BaseName++"_nodeA",
 2754:     NodeA = full_node_name(NodeAName),
 2755:     NodeACookieL = BaseName++"_cookieA",
 2756:     NodeACookie = list_to_atom(NodeACookieL),
 2757:     true = erlang:set_cookie( NodeA, NodeACookie ),
 2758:     { ok, NodeA } =
 2759:         start_node( "-hidden", NodeAName, "-setcookie "++NodeACookieL ),
 2760:    
 2761:     %% allow Node on NodeA so that other connections are dismissed
 2762:     {ok,[]} = rpc:call(NodeA, net_kernel, allowed, []),
 2763:     ok = rpc:call(NodeA, net_kernel, allow, [[Node]]),
 2764:     {ok,[Node]} = rpc:call(NodeA, net_kernel, allowed, []),
 2765:     try
 2766: 
 2767:         %% Verify the cluster
 2768:         [ NodeA ] = nodes(hidden),
 2769:         [ Node ] = rpc:call( NodeA, erlang, nodes, [hidden] ),
 2770: 
 2771:         %% Start node B with another different cookie
 2772:         NodeBName = BaseName++"_nodeB",
 2773:         NodeB = full_node_name(NodeBName),
 2774:         NodeBCookieL = BaseName++"_cookieB",
 2775:         NodeBCookie = list_to_atom(NodeBCookieL),
 2776:         true = erlang:set_cookie( NodeB, NodeBCookie ),
 2777:         { ok, NodeB } =
 2778:             start_node( "-hidden", NodeBName, "-setcookie "++NodeBCookieL ),
 2779: 
 2780:         try
 2781: 
 2782:             %% Verify the cluster
 2783:             equal_sets( [NodeA, NodeB], nodes(hidden) ),
 2784:             [ Node ] = rpc:call( NodeA, erlang, nodes, [hidden] ),
 2785:             [ Node ] = rpc:call( NodeB, erlang, nodes, [hidden] ),
 2786: 
 2787:             %% Verify that the nodes can not connect
 2788:             %% before correcting the cookie configuration
 2789:             pang = rpc:call( NodeA, net_adm, ping, [NodeB] ),
 2790:             pang = rpc:call( NodeB, net_adm, ping, [NodeA] ),
 2791: 
 2792:             %% Configure cookie and connect node A -> B
 2793:             true = rpc:call( NodeA, erlang, set_cookie, [NodeB, NodeBCookie] ),
 2794:             %% Verify that the nodes can not connect
 2795:             %% even though they have the same cookie
 2796:             pang = rpc:call( NodeA, net_adm, ping, [NodeB] ),
 2797:             pang = rpc:call( NodeB, net_adm, ping, [NodeA] ),
 2798: 
 2799:             %% Allow node B on node A
 2800:             ok = rpc:call(NodeA, net_kernel, allow, [[NodeB]]),
 2801:             {ok,[Node,NodeB]} = rpc:call(NodeA, net_kernel, allowed, []),
 2802:             pong = rpc:call(NodeA, net_adm, ping, [NodeB]),
 2803:             pong = rpc:call(NodeB, net_adm, ping, [NodeA]),
 2804: 
 2805:             %% Verify that A can connect to B
 2806:             %% even though they have different cookies
 2807:             true = rpc:call( NodeA, erlang, set_cookie, [NodeB, NodeACookie] ),
 2808:             pong = rpc:call(NodeA, net_adm, ping, [NodeB]),
 2809:             pong = rpc:call(NodeB, net_adm, ping, [NodeA]),
 2810: 
 2811:             %% Verify the cluster
 2812:             NodeACookie = rpc:call( NodeA, erlang, get_cookie, []),
 2813:             NodeBCookie = rpc:call( NodeB, erlang, get_cookie, []),
 2814:             equal_sets( [NodeA, NodeB], nodes(hidden) ),
 2815:             equal_sets( [Node, NodeB],
 2816:                         rpc:call( NodeA, erlang, nodes, [hidden] )),
 2817:             equal_sets( [Node, NodeA],
 2818:                         rpc:call( NodeB, erlang, nodes, [hidden] )),
 2819: 
 2820:             %% Disconnect node A from B
 2821:             true = rpc:call( NodeB, net_kernel, disconnect, [NodeA] ),
 2822: 
 2823:             %% Verify the cluster
 2824:             equal_sets( [NodeA, NodeB], nodes(hidden) ),
 2825:             [ Node ] = rpc:call( NodeA, erlang, nodes, [hidden] ),
 2826:             [ Node ] = rpc:call( NodeB, erlang, nodes, [hidden] ),
 2827: 
 2828:             %% Test non-registered process
 2829:             %% 'net_kernel' is registered to a process
 2830:             %% so we unregister it to test the output 'ignored'
 2831:             ok = rpc:call(NodeA, erts_internal, dynamic_node_name, [false]),
 2832:             true = rpc:call(NodeA, erlang, unregister, [net_kernel]),
 2833:             ignored = rpc:call(NodeA, net_kernel, allow, [[NodeB]])
 2834:         after
 2835:             _ = stop_node(NodeB)
 2836:         end
 2837:     after
 2838:         _ = stop_node(NodeA)
 2839:     end,
 2840:     [] = nodes(hidden),
 2841:     ok.
 2842: 
 2843: %% Misc. functions
 2844: 
 2845: equal_sets(A, B) ->
 2846:     S = lists:sort(A),
 2847:     case lists:sort(B) of
 2848:         S ->
 2849:             ok;
 2850:         _ ->
 2851:             erlang:error({not_equal_sets, A, B})
 2852:     end.
 2853: 
 2854: run_dist_configs(Func, Config) ->
 2855:     GetOptProlog = "-proto_dist gen_tcp -gen_tcp_dist_output_loop "
 2856:         ++ atom_to_list(?MODULE) ++ " ",
 2857:     GenTcpDistTest = case get_gen_tcp_dist_test_type() of
 2858:                          default ->
 2859:                              {"gen_tcp_dist", "-proto_dist gen_tcp"};
 2860:                          size ->
 2861:                              {"gen_tcp_dist (get_size)",
 2862:                               GetOptProlog ++ "dist_cntrlr_output_test_size"}
 2863:                      end,
 2864:     lists:map(fun ({DCfgName, DCfg}) ->
 2865:                       io:format("~n~n=== Running ~s configuration ===~n~n",
 2866:                                 [DCfgName]),
 2867:                       Func(DCfg, Config)
 2868:               end,
 2869:               [{"default", ""}, GenTcpDistTest]).
 2870: 
 2871: start_gen_tcp_dist_test_type_server() ->
 2872:     Me = self(),
 2873:     Go = make_ref(),
 2874:     io:format("STARTING: gen_tcp_dist_test_type_server~n",[]),
 2875:     {P, M} = spawn_monitor(fun () ->
 2876:                                    register(gen_tcp_dist_test_type_server, self()),
 2877:                                    Me ! Go,
 2878:                                    gen_tcp_dist_test_type_server()
 2879:                            end),
 2880:     receive
 2881:         Go ->
 2882:             ok;
 2883:         {'DOWN', M, process, P, _} ->
 2884:             start_gen_tcp_dist_test_type_server()
 2885:     end.
 2886: 
 2887: kill_gen_tcp_dist_test_type_server() ->
 2888:     case whereis(gen_tcp_dist_test_type_server) of
 2889:         undefined ->
 2890:             ok;
 2891:         Pid ->
 2892:             exit(Pid,kill),
 2893:             %% Sync death, before continuing...
 2894:             false = erlang:is_process_alive(Pid)
 2895:     end.
 2896: 
 2897: gen_tcp_dist_test_type_server() ->
 2898:     Type = case abs(erlang:monotonic_time(second)) rem 2 of
 2899:                0 -> default;
 2900:                1 -> size
 2901:            end,
 2902:     gen_tcp_dist_test_type_server(Type).
 2903: 
 2904: gen_tcp_dist_test_type_server(Type) ->
 2905:     receive
 2906:         {From, Ref} ->
 2907:             From ! {Ref, Type},
 2908:             NewType = case Type of
 2909:                           default -> size;
 2910:                           size -> default
 2911:                       end,
 2912:             gen_tcp_dist_test_type_server(NewType)
 2913:     end.
 2914: 
 2915: get_gen_tcp_dist_test_type() ->
 2916:     Ref = make_ref(),
 2917:     try
 2918:         gen_tcp_dist_test_type_server ! {self(), Ref},
 2919:         receive
 2920:             {Ref, Type} ->
 2921:                 Type
 2922:         end
 2923:     catch
 2924:         error:badarg ->
 2925:             start_gen_tcp_dist_test_type_server(),
 2926:             get_gen_tcp_dist_test_type()
 2927:     end.
 2928: 
 2929: dist_cntrlr_output_test_size(DHandle, Socket) ->
 2930:     false = erlang:dist_ctrl_get_opt(DHandle, get_size),
 2931:     false = erlang:dist_ctrl_set_opt(DHandle, get_size, true),
 2932:     true = erlang:dist_ctrl_get_opt(DHandle, get_size),
 2933:     true = erlang:dist_ctrl_set_opt(DHandle, get_size, false),
 2934:     false = erlang:dist_ctrl_get_opt(DHandle, get_size),
 2935:     false = erlang:dist_ctrl_set_opt(DHandle, get_size, true),
 2936:     true = erlang:dist_ctrl_get_opt(DHandle, get_size),
 2937:     dist_cntrlr_output_loop_size(DHandle, Socket).
 2938: 
 2939: dist_cntrlr_output_loop_size(DHandle, Socket) ->
 2940:     receive
 2941:         dist_data ->
 2942:             %% Outgoing data from this node...
 2943:             dist_cntrlr_send_data_size(DHandle, Socket);
 2944:         _ ->
 2945:             ok %% Drop garbage message...
 2946:     end,
 2947:     dist_cntrlr_output_loop_size(DHandle, Socket).
 2948: 
 2949: dist_cntrlr_send_data_size(DHandle, Socket) ->
 2950:     case erlang:dist_ctrl_get_data(DHandle) of
 2951:         none ->
 2952:             erlang:dist_ctrl_get_data_notification(DHandle);
 2953:         {Size, Data} ->
 2954:             ok = ensure_iovec(Data),
 2955:             Size = erlang:iolist_size(Data),
 2956:             ok = gen_tcp:send(Socket, Data),
 2957:             dist_cntrlr_send_data_size(DHandle, Socket)
 2958:     end.
 2959: 
 2960: ensure_iovec([]) ->
 2961:     ok;
 2962: ensure_iovec([X|Y]) when is_binary(X) ->
 2963:     ensure_iovec(Y).
 2964: 
 2965: monitor_node_state() ->
 2966:     erts_debug:set_internal_state(available_internal_state, true),
 2967:     MonitoringNodes = erts_debug:get_internal_state(monitoring_nodes),
 2968:     erts_debug:set_internal_state(available_internal_state, false),
 2969:     MonitoringNodes.
 2970: 
 2971: 
 2972: check_no_nodedown_nodeup(TimeOut) ->
 2973:     receive
 2974: 	{nodeup, _, _} = Msg -> ct:fail({unexpected_nodeup, Msg});
 2975: 	{nodeup, _} = Msg -> ct:fail({unexpected_nodeup, Msg});
 2976: 	{nodedown, _, _} = Msg -> ct:fail({unexpected_nodedown, Msg});
 2977: 	{nodedown, _} = Msg -> ct:fail({unexpected_nodedown, Msg})
 2978:     after TimeOut ->
 2979: 	    ok
 2980:     end.
 2981: 
 2982: print_my_messages() ->
 2983:     {messages, Messages} = process_info(self(), messages),
 2984:     io:format("Messages: ~p~n", [Messages]),
 2985:     ok.
 2986: 
 2987: 
 2988: sleep(T) -> receive after T * 1000 -> ok end.	
 2989: 
 2990: start_node(_DCfg, Name, Param, this) ->
 2991:     NewParam = Param ++ " -pa " ++ filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
 2992:     test_server:start_node(Name, peer, [{args, NewParam}, {erl, [this]}]);
 2993: start_node(DCfg, Name, Param, "this") ->
 2994:     NewParam = Param ++ " -pa " ++ filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)) ++ " " ++ DCfg,
 2995:     test_server:start_node(Name, peer, [{args, NewParam}, {erl, [this]}]);
 2996: start_node(DCfg, Name, Param, Rel) when is_atom(Rel) ->
 2997:     NewParam = Param ++ " -pa " ++ filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)) ++ " " ++ DCfg,
 2998:     test_server:start_node(Name, peer, [{args, NewParam}, {erl, [{release, atom_to_list(Rel)}]}]);
 2999: start_node(DCfg, Name, Param, Rel) when is_list(Rel) ->
 3000:     NewParam = Param ++ " -pa " ++ filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)) ++ " " ++ DCfg,
 3001:     test_server:start_node(Name, peer, [{args, NewParam}, {erl, [{release, Rel}]}]).
 3002: 
 3003: start_node(DCfg, Name, Param) ->
 3004:     NewParam = Param ++ " -pa " ++ filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)) ++ " " ++ DCfg,
 3005:     test_server:start_node(Name, slave, [{args, NewParam}]).
 3006: 
 3007: start_node(DCfg, Name) ->
 3008:     start_node(DCfg, Name, "").
 3009: 
 3010: stop_node(Node) ->
 3011:     test_server:stop_node(Node).
 3012: 
 3013: get_nodenames(N, T) ->
 3014:     get_nodenames(N, T, []).
 3015: 
 3016: get_nodenames(0, _, Acc) ->
 3017:     Acc;
 3018: get_nodenames(N, T, Acc) ->
 3019:     U = erlang:unique_integer([positive]),
 3020:     get_nodenames(N-1, T, [list_to_atom(atom_to_list(T)
 3021: 					++ "-"
 3022: 					++ ?MODULE_STRING
 3023: 					++ "-"
 3024: 					++ integer_to_list(U)) | Acc]).
 3025: 
 3026: get_numbered_nodenames(N, T) ->
 3027:     get_numbered_nodenames(N, T, []).
 3028: 
 3029: get_numbered_nodenames(0, _, Acc) ->
 3030:     Acc;
 3031: get_numbered_nodenames(N, T, Acc) ->
 3032:     U = erlang:unique_integer([positive]),
 3033:     NL = [list_to_atom(atom_to_list(T) ++ integer_to_list(N)
 3034: 		       ++ "-"
 3035: 		       ++ ?MODULE_STRING
 3036: 		       ++ "-"
 3037: 		       ++ integer_to_list(U)) | Acc],
 3038:     get_numbered_nodenames(N-1, T, NL).
 3039: 
 3040: wait_until(Fun) ->
 3041:     case Fun() of
 3042: 	true ->
 3043: 	    ok;
 3044: 	_ ->
 3045: 	    receive
 3046: 	    after 100 ->
 3047: 		    wait_until(Fun)
 3048: 	    end
 3049:     end.
 3050: 
 3051: repeat(Fun, 0) when is_function(Fun) ->
 3052:     ok;
 3053: repeat(Fun, N) when is_function(Fun), is_integer(N), N > 0 ->
 3054:     Fun(),
 3055:     repeat(Fun, N-1).
 3056: 
 3057: no_msgs(Wait) ->
 3058:     receive after Wait -> no_msgs() end.
 3059: 
 3060: no_msgs() ->
 3061:     {messages, []} = process_info(self(), messages).
 3062: 
 3063: block_emu(Ms) ->
 3064:     erts_debug:set_internal_state(available_internal_state, true),
 3065:     Res = erts_debug:set_internal_state(block, Ms),
 3066:     erts_debug:set_internal_state(available_internal_state, false),
 3067:     Res.
 3068: 
 3069:
